loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and plastic ware such as containers and bowls to sell.

loans.name: Donaly

texts.es: DONALY: Es una mujer afable de 51 años de edad, originaria de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Está casada, tiene 5 hijos: 4 son mayores de edad y la menor de 13 años estudia su primer año de secundaria.. Solicita préstamo para cubrir gastos escolares de su hija. Con el préstamo quiere comprar: uniforme, zapatos, mochila y cuadernos para el II semestre escolar. Ella sueña con tener una vivienda más digna con mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Donaly is an affable 51-year-old woman who comes from Bilwi in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. She is married and has 5 children. Four of them are grown up and the youngest daughter is in her first year at secondary school.

Donaly is asking for a loan to cover the school costs for her daughter. With the loan she wants to buy uniform, shoes, a rucksack and exercise books for the second school semester.

Her dream is to have a more decent home with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy uniform, shoes, a rucksack and exercise books for her daughter's second school semester.

loans.name: Juan Vicente

texts.es: Juan de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace 10 años, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y con las ganancias que obtiene ha podido salir adelante, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas etc. y mejorar el terreno donde desea realizar la siembra para tener una buena producción y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Juan, who is 41 years old, lives in his own house with his family group. For 10 years he has made a living growing staple grains. He sells his produce in the various markets which are near his house and with the profits he makes he has been able to make progress in life.

He is asking for a loan to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides etc. and improve the land where he wants to sow seed in order to have a good yield and so be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides etc. and improve the land.

loans.name: Ecariria Welfare Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth, the lady in the middle of the photo holding a passbook, is a member of the Ecariria Welfare Group. She is 48 years old and a mother to 8 children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in order to benefit from the training courses, especially in enterprise development.

She practices mixed farming with potatoes, kale and carrots, and she has 2 cows. She is taking out a Kiva loan to buy certified seeds and animal feeds which will increase her production and income.  

She is grateful to Kiva and its lenders for the financial support.

loans.use: To buy certified vegetable seeds and animal feeds for increased production and income.

loans.name: Makena Single Mothers Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand in the photo is Susan, who is a member of the Makena Single Mothers Group. She is forty years old and a mother of three. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) in July 2014.

Susan farms maize, beans, bananas and potatoes. She is grateful to Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) for the enterprise training and for broadening her mind in relation to business ideas. 

She is taking out a Kiva loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. This will enable her to diversify her income sources and supplement her husband’s earnings. With better income, she will educate her children and meet other family needs, such as food and medical care.

Susan is happy with Kiva and their lenders for their support, and she promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers, which will lead to more sales and thus supplement family income.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has been operating a butcher shop business for the past 15 years, selling goat meat. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase a stock of goats to slaughter and get meat for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of goats to slaughter and get meat for resale

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат, 46 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Она работает учителем в средней школе, общий стаж  - более 23 лет. Ее заработная плата составляет 9,535 сом (KGS). В целях улучшения жилищных условий, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 47,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для проведения ремонта. Свои доходы Мухаббат планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий семьи.
texts.en:
Muhabbat is 46 years old, married, and has three children. She is a secondary school teacher, and has been for more than 23 years. Her pay is about 9,535 som (KGS). 

In order to improve her living conditions, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 47,000 som (KGS), to buy building materials for repairs. Muhabbat plans to invest the funds in the further improvement of her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for repairing her house.

loans.name: Husniya

texts.ru: Молодую и красивую девушку из района Дж. Руми зовут Хусния. Она не замужем, живет с родителями и сестрой. Ей всего 24 года. Она самая старшая дочка в семье. Её младшей сестре 20 лет. Из-за трудностей финансового положения, её родители уехали в Россию на заработки. В данный момент Хусния с сестрой живут одни. Хусния сама старается обеспечивать себя и сестру. Она занимается шитьем одежды. Она шьет разные виды платьев, как европейские, так и национальные. У Хуснии хороший талант. Она всегда придумывает что-то новое, чтобы удивить своих клиенток. Однако из-за нехватки денежных средств она никак не сможет купить себе новую швейную машинку, а её настоящая машинка уже не в состоянии хорошо шить. Хусния решила взять кредит. Она верит, что с вашей помощью сможет добиться много успехов и стать одной из лучших портних своего района.
texts.en:
Husniya is a young and beautiful young lady from J. Rumi district. She is unmarried, and lives with her parents and sister. She is only 24 years old. She is the eldest daughter in the family. Her younger sister is 20 years old. 

Because of financial difficulties, her parents moved to Russia for work. Currently, Husniya and her sister live alone. Husniya tries to provide for herself and her sister. She sews clothes for a living. She sews different types of dresses, such as European and traditional ethnic. Husiniya has talent. She is always thinking up something new to surprise her clients with. 

However, because of a lack of funds, she is unable to buy herself a new sewing machine. Her current machine is no longer in a condition to sew properly. Husiniya decided to take a loan. She believes that with your help, she will be able to achieve a lot of success and become one of the best tailors in her district.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Sansio

texts.en:
Sansio is 36 years and a resident of Mayama in the Rakai district. He is married with 5 children who all attend school.
 
Sansio deals in the business of making traditional cloth referred to as bark cloth, which he started in 2008 in order to increase his daily income. He is also a coffee farmer, and he runs a retail shop on a busy street to supplement the family income. He works 7 days a week and 12 hours a day.  

He wants a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to buy more bark cloth to meet the increased demand for it. His customers are people from different areas of the town and from the villages. His challenges are inadequate capital to expand the business, and competition.

Sansio is a hardworking and focused man.

loans.use: To buy a stock of bark cloth to sell.

loans.name: Sreyour's Group

texts.en:
Sreyour, 35, lives with family members in a rural area of Kampong Cham province's Ou Reang Ov district. She is a mother of five children, three of whom are in school while the other two are too young. 

To earn a living for her family, she grows rice and works for others for a fee. She has been involved in this business for nine years, and it earns her about 31,000 KHR per day. She is able to save around 18,000 KHR each day from her business. 

This is her third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she fully repaid her past loans. Her past loans helped to improve the conditions for her farming.

Sreyour is the group leader in this group of four. She will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer and seed, and pay plowing fees, to support her rice fields. 

She hopes that she can get better yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed, and pay plowing fees, for her rice fields

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Muso

texts.ru: Мусо цивилизованный и культурный человек. Он из района Дж. Руми. Ему 58 лет, он женат и имеет четырех детей. Мусо работает в джамоате своего района. Она работает там уже 4 года. Его жена домохозяйка. Мусо трудолюбивый человек. Кроме своей работы он дополнительно занимается растениеводством. Он уже 20 лет как занимается этим делом, которое передалось ему по наследству.  Мусе всегда помогает его жена. Они получают большой доход от своей деятельности, чем работа в джамоате. Поэтому Мусо каждый год сажает разные овощные культуры, чтобы продавать их с наценкой. В этом году он тоже посадил овощи, но у него не хватает денег на минеральные удобрения и он обратился за кредитом. Мусо нуждается на вашей поддержке и обещает, что будет, погашать свой займ во время.
texts.en:
Muso is a civilised and cultured person. He is from J. Rumi district. He is 58 years old, married, and has four children. Muso works in the administrative unit of his district. He has been working there for four years. His wife is a homemaker. 

Muso is hardworking. Other than his job, he also is engaged in crop cultivation. He has done this work, which was passed down to him, for 20 years. Muso's wife always helps him. They receive a larger income from their business than from work at the administration unit. Thus, Muso plants different vegetable crops every year, in order to sell them for profit. 

This year he has also planted vegetables, but he does not have enough money to buy mineral fertilisers. He has applied for a loan. Muso needs your support, and promises that he will repay his loan on time.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Meet 35-year-old Fatimah from Nablus city. She is married with five children between the ages of 2 and 11 years; three of the children are currently attending school.

Fatimah used to work in salons for other employers, until she got 15 years' experience and now she wants to start her own business and open her own salon. That's why she requested a loan from ACAD.

The main challenges for Fatimah's business are having other competitors and the seasonality of her business.

Fatimah hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to improve her family's standard of living. In the future, Fatimah plans to see her business grow. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy needed equipment for her salon

loans.name: Ainakul

texts.ru: Айнакул, 63 года, вдова, есть 2 дочери и 3 сына. У Айнакул среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 10 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 коров, а также имеет земельный надел мерою 5,0 ГА, на котором ежегодно выращивает клевер. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса Айнакул составляет около 16,000 сом (KGS), этих средств катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь и содержание семьи. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнакул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на сбор урожая клевера, который будет служить кормом для скота. Доходы от кредита Айнакул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Ainakul is 63 years old, widowed, and has two daughters and three sons. Ainakul has secondary education. She is engaged in animal and field husbandry in order to provide income for her family, having started ten years ago. Thanks to her persistent hard work, today her farm has five cows. It also has a land plot of 5.0 hectares, on which she cultivates clover yearly. 

Ainakul's monthly income from the business is about 16,000 som (KGS). This amount is disastrously insufficient for living adequately and supporting her family. In order to further develop her farm, Ainakul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to harvest clover, which will be used as livestock feed. Ainakul plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to harvest clover as feed for her livestock in order to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Mahluba

texts.ru: Махлуба, 52 года, замужем, есть 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Махлубы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы и 8 овец. Также у Махлубы есть торговый павильон, где она реализует продукты питания. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего торгового дела, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку продуктов питания для реализации и хочет сменить место торговли.
texts.en:
Mahluba is 52 years old, married, and has two children. She has secondary education. In order to provide income for her family, she is engaged in animal husbandry. Thanks to Mahluba's persistent hard work, today the farm has two cows and eight sheep. Mahluba also has a shopping pavilion, where she sells food products. Her monthly income is 13,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her retail business, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) in order to buy food products for resale. She also wants to change her shop location.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale and to change her shop location.

loans.name: Gulsunbu

texts.ru: Гулсунбу, 60 лет, вдова, мать 7 детей. У нее среднее образование. Гулсунбу на пенсии, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, 37 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве Гулсунбу есть 2 коровы, 8 овец, также есть земельный надел, мерою 3,09 ГА, где она сажает картофель, кукурузу, подсолнечник для реализации. Ее деятельность приносит прибыль в размере около 29,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Семья берется за любую работу, так как доходов не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулсунбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья коров. Доходы от кредита Гулсунбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса и улучшение материального благосостояния семьи.
texts.en:
Gulsunbu is 60 years old, widowed, and has seven children. She has secondary education. Gulsunbu is retired. She has been farming for 37 years to provide income for her family. Gulsunbu's farm has two cows and eight sheep.  There is also a land plot of 3.09 hectares, where she grows potatoes, corn, and sunflowers for sale. Her business brings a profit of about 29,000 som (KGS) a month. 

The family does odd jobs as they do not have enough income to live adequately. Thus, in order to further develop her business, Gulsunbu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to increase the number of cows she has. Gulsunbu plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further augmentation of her business, and in the improvement of her family's financial well-being.

loans.use: to buy some cows for increasing her income.

loans.name: Syina

texts.ru: Сыйна, 47 лет, замужем, 4 детей. У Сыйны высшее образование, работает учителем младших классов, также с 1993 года в качестве дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 5 коров, 15 овец. Сыйна известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 12,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), который направит на покупку телят и ягнят для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Сыйна планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Syina is 47 years old, married, and has four children. Syina has higher education. She is an elementary school teacher. She has also been farming for profit since 1993. Her farm has five cows and fifteen sheep. Syina is known as a principled, honest, respectable, and reliable person. Today her business brings a monthly profit of 12,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her farm, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS), which will go into buying calves and lambs for fattening up and resale. Syina plans to use the funds from the loan for developing her farm.

loans.use: to buy some calves and lambs for fattening and resale.

loans.name: German Francisco

texts.es: Don German de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, él  se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 30 años, además trabaja de albañil vende sus productos agrícolas en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, Don German está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
German, 54, lives in his own house with his wife.  For 30 years he has been growing corn and beans, and working as a bricklayer.  He sells his produce in areas near his home.

German is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies like seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc. and to improve the land shown in the photograph.  This is so he can improve his living conditions.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc. and improve his land.

loans.name: Maria Bernarda

texts.es: María de 59 años de edad es madre soltera debido a que hace un par de años tuvo la dolorosa pérdida de su compañero de vida y sola ha luchado para sacar a delante a su hijo quien ahora ya es mayor de edad. María vive en casa propia  donde se  dedica a la venta de madera y granos básicos como maíz, frijol, arroz y maicillo, gracias a su trabajo es como puede salir adelante y a diario velar por el bienestar de su hogar. María  quiere mejorar su vivienda y para ello piensa construir una galera, pero debido a que no cuenta con las facilidades económicas ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para la compra de, polines, laminas y pago de mano de obra y así poder iniciar la construcción de una galera que le brinde una mejor comodidad y seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria, 59, is a single mother who lost her life partner several years ago.  So, alone, she has raised her son who is now an adult.  Maria lives in her own house and earns a living selling wood and basic grains like corn, beans, rice and millet.  Thanks to her work she is able to get ahead and look after her household.

Maria wants to improve her home by building a porch, but she does not have the economy to do so.  Therefore she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy beams and metal sheeting, and pay labor costs to begin construction of the porch.  This will make her family more comfortable and safer.

loans.use: To buy beams and metal sheeting, and to pay labor costs to begin building a porch.

loans.name: Maria Sonia

texts.es: Doña Maria tiene 55 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su hija, ella posee desde hace varios años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, gracias a sus ventas es como ha podido salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 55 years old and lives in her own house with her daughter.  For several years she has been running a small store set up in her home.  She has many customers because of her low prices and kind customer service.  Thanks to her sales she has been able to get ahead.

She is requesting a loan to buy more soups, basic grains, sweets, pastries, etc. to earn more income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Uulbu

texts.ru: Уулбу, 42 года, замужем, есть дочь. У нее среднее образование, на протяжении 20 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть корова, 5 овец, лошадь. На 1,0 Га земли выращивает рис. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет до 20,400 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Уулбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Uulbu is 42 years old, married, and has a daughter. She has secondary education. For 20 years she has worked in animal and field husbandry. On her farm there is a cow, five sheep, and a horse. On 1.0 hectare of land, she cultivates rice. The monthly profit comes to about 20,400 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her business, Uulbu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) in order to buy cows for fattening up and resale. She plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further augmentation of her business.

loans.use: to buy additional cows for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Carmen Beatriz

texts.es: Carmen de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol se ha dedicado a la actividad agrícolas casi toda su vida pues sus padres le enseñaron ese trabajo, sus productos agrícolas los comercializa en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos como: semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía  y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Carmen, 35, lives in her own house with her family.  She grows corn and beans and has worked in agriculture nearly all her life since her parents taught her the trade.  She sells her products at the different markets near her home.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as seeds, manure, fertlizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc. and improve the land seen in the photograph.  This way she will be able to earn more income.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, and improve her land.

loans.name: Gustavo Antonio

texts.es: Don Gustavo de 65 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos tiene  32 años de experiencia e inicio con capital propio,  comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa durante todo el año,  el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder tener un buen cultivo y así recibir mejores ganancias económicas.
texts.en:
Gustavo, 65, lives in his own house with his son.  For 32 years he has been growing basic grains, having started out with his own capital.  He sells his produce at the different markets near his home all year long.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc. and improve the land seen in the photograph.  This is to grow a better crop and earn more profit.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc. and improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz, elotes, frijol y sandia, inicio con capital propio desde hace 7 años, comercializa sus productos entre los meses de enero a marzo en agencias de granos básicos, el joven vive en casa propia con su madre, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, pago de mano de obra y abono, para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su madre.
texts.en:
This young man's face has been pixelated because he is 23 years old and lives in a high-risk area. He makes a living growing corn, sweetcorn, beans and watermelon. He started out 7 years ago with capital of his own and sells his produce between the months of January and March at agencies dealing in staple grains. He lives in his own house with his mother. 

This young man is asking for a loan to buy seeds and pay for manual labour and manure, so he can continue his work and so have a better quality of life for himself and his mother.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay for manual labour and manure.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandra, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, ella se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. para prepararle el desayuno a su pareja, para que se vaya a trabajar en las parcelas donde cultiva; mientras ella se dedica a preparar la venta de paletas y sorbetes que tiene en su casa desde hace varios años.


Sandra, se dedica a vender helados en su casa y a surtir a vendedores que van a los cantones del municipio y en los alrededores, todo esto lo realiza para buscar el sustento para su familia.

Sandra, necesita el crédito para comprar productos de primera necesidad y granos básicos, porque desea obtener más ingresos y ampliar su mercado de clientes.

Sandra, sueña con comprar vacas e iniciar la producción de leche.
texts.en:
Sandra studied as far as the high school diploma and is in a relationship. Her partner makes a living from agriculture. She gets up at 4.30am to prepare her partner's breakfast for him, so that he can go to work on the plots of land which he cultivates. Meanwhile she starts work getting ready to sell the ice lollies and sorbets which she has been selling from her home for several years. She makes a living selling ice cream from her house and supplying the vendors who go to the districts in the town and the surrounding areas. She does all this in order to find the means to support her family.

Sandra needs the loan to buy basic essentials and staple grains, because she wants to make more income and widen her customer market.

Sandra's dream is to buy cows and start milk production.

loans.use: to buy basic essentials and staple grains.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 8 años comercializa sus productos en los meses de marzo y abril en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas etc. y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos
texts.en:
Francisco, who is 46 years old, lives in his own house with his family group. For 8 years he has made a living growing corn and beans. He sells his produce in the months of March and April around the area where he lives.

He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides etc. so he can make a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides etc.

loans.name: Sandra Beatriz

texts.es:
Sandra, de 48 años de edad, todo sus vida se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos ya que no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, luego se acompañó y junto a su esposo procrearon un hijo, el cual tiene  7 años de edad, Sandra trabaja en un cafetín, y  junto a su hermano el cultivo de pepino. 

Sandra ya tiene tres años trabajar en el  cafetín es de donde obtiene sus ingresos para satisfacer los gastos de la familia, y desde hace cinco años junto a su hermano trabajan las hortalizas.


El dinero del crédito lo utilizara en establecer una parcela de pepino, y junto a su hermano obtienen sus ganancias. 

El sueño de Sandra es ver su hijo preparado como una profesional para ayudar y el bienestar de la sociedad y por su puesto poner su propio cafetín y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sandra is 48 years old. Her whole life she has made a living performing domestic duties because she did not have the opportunity to attend a school. Later on she married and together with her husband, had a son, who is 7 years old. Sandra works in a small cafe and cultivates cucumbers with her brother.

Sandra already has three years work experience at the cafe, where she earns her income to meet family expenses. Together with her brother, for the last five years they grew vegetables.

The money from the loan will be used to establish a cucumber patch, and together with her brother, make money.

Sandra's dream is to see her son educated as a professional so that he can help out, for the well-being of society and of course to set up his own cafe to get better earnings.

loans.use: to plant cucumber.

loans.name: Grupo Las Flores De Primavera Group

texts.es:
Maria Dolores  (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de suéter verde) es una mujer de 31 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 13 y 9 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad del departamento de Sololá. Maria Dolores para poder obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la  compra y venta de pollos de crianza, ella tiene cinco años de realizar esta labor, para Maria  poder incrementar su negocio es muy importante, es por ello que junto a un grupo de señoras solicita un crédito para  poder comprar más pollos para crianza y luego venderlos a un buen precio.
Maria Dolores tiene el Anhelo de poder mejorar sus ingresos para ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria Dolores (first on the left hand side of the photo wearing a green sweater) is a 31 year old woman. She is married with a beautiful family of three sons aged between 9 and 13. This humble family lives in a community in the department of Solola. For the past five years Maria has made a living buying and selling breeding chickens. This has provided an income and allows her family to get ahead. Growing her business is very important for Maria. Together with a group of women, she is asking for a loan to buy more breeding chickens which she will then sell for a good price. Maria Dolores yearns to increase her income so that she can improve her families' quality of life.

loans.use: to buy and sell breeding chickens.

loans.name: Marta Areli

texts.es:
Marta, de 51 años de edad, logro estudiar hasta 6ª grado, luego ya no pudo seguir los estudios y se acompaño, madre de 3 hijos, hoy mayores de edad uno de ellos vive con ella y le ayuda en los gastos de la familia su compañero de vida la abandono hace varios años.

Marta empezó a trabajar y ayudar a sus padres en el comercio en la venta de comida y otros antojos, cuando se acompaño, con mucho esfuerzo lograron construir un pequeño comedor donde vendían comida y antojos, luego su compañero de vida le abandono, pero  logro sacar a delante a sus hijos, actualmente tiene un comedor donde le ayuda un hijo y su nuera.

El crédito serán utilizado para surtir una pequeña tienda y ademas en la comprar bancas donde puedan sentarse sus clientes para disfrutar de sus alimentos.

Marta sueña con ampliar su negocio, valerse por si mismos, y llevar una vida digna
texts.en:
51-year-old Marta managed to study as far as 6th grade, then she was unable to continue with her education. She got together with her partner and is mother to 3 children who are now grown up. One of them lives with her and he helps her with the family expenses. Her life partner left her several years ago.

Marta started working and helping her parents in their business selling meals and other snacks. When she met her partner they managed, with a great deal of effort, to build a small cafeteria where they sold meals and snacks. Then her life partner left her, but she managed to bring up her children. Currently she has a cafeteria where one of her sons and her daughter-in-law help her.

The loan will be used to stock a small shop and also to buy benches where her customers can sit down to enjoy her dishes.

Marta dreams of expanding her business, being self-sufficient, and having a decent life.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her shop.

loans.name: Sarieb's Group

texts.en: A resident living in Siem Reap province, Sarieb is 50 years old and a mother of six children, one of whom is in school and dependent on her. To provide a living, she grows rice and cassava as her main sources of income. She is also raising pigs and working for others for a fee, to supplement her earnings. She has had some problems in her business, such as insects destroying her rice and her pigs getting sick. Now, Saried leads a group of two members in order to get a new loan to save her business. This will be the third cycle for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. The loans were really helpful to her as they have enabled her to greatly improve her living conditions. As a representative of the group, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She hopes that she can get more income from her rice farming business, which will enable her to grow her additional business of pig farming by purchasing more pigs to raise.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional beauty products

loans.name: 12 De Junio Group

texts.es: A sus  50 años de edad Lidia es una señora  muy trabajadora, desde muy joven su fuente de ingresos es la crianza y comercio de animales menores, la ganadería, trabajar en quehaceres domésticos y entre otros trabajos que se dedica para  sacar adelante  a sus hijas, Lidia tiene sus hijas de 16, 20, 23, 27,30 y 32 años de edad, Lidia es madre soltera pero comenta que sabiendo trabajar de una manera muy responsable ha podido darles lo más necesario a sus hijas. En la actualidad Lidia  se dedica a la crianza y comercio de animales,  es empleada domestica en una casa, y en la madrugada se dedica a sacar leche de las vacas. Lidia solicita 1200 dolares del  crédito para destinarlo en la compra de chanchos y terneros para comercializarlos en la ferias de las ciudades más cercanas, Lidia conoce  a sus compañeros de grupo y comenta que  han demostrado ser responsables, además tienen sus negocios establecidos ya que viven en el campo y crian sus animales. Lidia ya obtuvo anteriormente un crédito con KIVA y nuestra institución y ha demostrado el esfuerzo por quedar bien  en el pago de sus cuotas, Lidia comenta que sus ingresos económicos le alcanzaron para darles a sus hijas  la educación primaria. En la actualidad las hijas de Lidia están estudiando a distancia o sea los fines de semana. Lidia apoya a sus hijas y tiene la aspiración de que ellas y sus nietas que viven con Lidia sigan estudiando y así logren a futuro conseguir un buen trabajo ya que en la actualidad trabajan al jornal de trabajos de agricultura.
texts.en:
At the age of 50 Lidia is a very hard-working woman. From a very young age her source of income has been raising and selling small animals, livestock farming, doing domestic work and various other jobs which she does in order to bring up her daughters. Lidia has daughters aged 16, 20, 23, 27, 30 and 32 years. She is a single mother but says that, knowing how to work in a very responsible way, she has been able to give her daughters the things they need most. Currently Lidia makes a living raising and selling animals and is a domestic help in a house, as well as working early in the mornings milking cows.

Lidia is asking for 1200 dollars from the loan, to use for buying pigs and calves to sell at the markets in the nearest cities. Lidia knows her companions in the group and says they have shown themselves to be responsible as well as having established businesses since they live in the countryside and raise animals.  

Lidia has previously had a loan with Kiva and this institution and has demonstrated determination to make a good impression in paying her instalments. Lidia says that her income was sufficient to give her daughters their primary education. Currently her daughters are studying by distance learning-in other words, at the weekends. Lidia supports her daughters and her aspiration is for them and the grandchildren who live with her to continue their education and, by doing this, manage to get a good job in the future, since at the moment they work as agricultural day labourers.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Christian

texts.en:
Christian, who is in his mid-40’s, is married with one child. He has been running a business of selling chicken (broilers) and chips for four months now. He works from 6 am to 09 pm, and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be his fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy Irish potatoes and add extra chicken. He has paid back all of his loans successfully. He is doing fine with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. He used the profits to covered household expenses.

He will use this loan to buy Irish potatoes and 200 chicks. 

He dreams that his business will grow, to sell more and increase customers. 

He will be  accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes and 200 chicks

loans.name: John Yahaya

texts.en:
John Yahaya is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Kyasge village. John Yahaya joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. 

Through Babban Gona’s input loan, John Yahaya will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilizer, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags. This will see him increase his household income considerably. 

Thanks to Babban Gona's support, John Yahaya now has the opportunity to increase his yields and income and use his additional earnings to build a better home for his family.

loans.use: To purchase improved farm inputs that will increase the farmer’s yields

loans.name: Sania

texts.en:
Sania is married and has four children who attend school. She also takes care of additional family members. 

She sells used clothes at the market on a retail basis and has been in this business for six years. She works at the market six days a week. 

Sania has applied for a loan from MCDT-SACCO to buy a bale of used clothes. 

Her major business challenges include seasonality and transportation. She would like to build rental houses in the future. 

Sania resides in her own house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes.

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en:
Mejumaa is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop for the past year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. In addition, she also sells open air food. The major challenge she faces in her business is transportation.

With this loan, she wants to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu in order to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, maize flour beans, and soft drinks for her restaurant.

loans.name: Gumercindo

texts.es: Gumercindo, tiene 67 años de edad, esta soltero vive en su casa junto a su hijo mayor, y reside en una aldea del municipio de San Marcos, Santa Barbara. El Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura con el cultivo de maíz y frijol y hace 5 años decidió por establecer una pequeña pulpería para obtener otros ingresos, ofrece granos básicos, pan, azúcar, refrescos, churros, huevos, jugos y otros. El solicita un prestamo para realizar el cultivo de maíz y frijol, va comprar semillas de mejor calidad  y abonos para obtener mayor producción. Su meta es lograr tener un negocio surtido para ofrecer variedad de productos.
texts.en: Gumercindo is 67 years old. He is single and he lives in his home with his oldest son in a neighborhood of the town of San Marcos, Santa Barbara. He has always worked in agriculture, such as growing corn and beans. Five years ago, he decided to open a small store to obtain more income. He sells basic grains, bread, sugar, beverages, churros, eggs, juices and more. He is asking for a loan to plant corn and beans. He is going to buy better quality seeds and fertilizer to get a better yield. His goal is to be able to have a well stocked business to offer a variety of products.

loans.use: To buy improved seed and fertilizer to plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Kerly Aracely

texts.es:
En el recinto Libertad del Toachi, una zona dedica a la producción de pollos, chanchos y ganado, vive Kerly una señora de 45 años de edad quien tiene dos hijas, habitan en casa de familiares varios años.
Kerly es docente en una escuela del recinto, lleva trabajando muchos años en el mismo sector, ya por las  tardes puede compartir con sus pequeñas. Kerly tiene un sueño desde hace un tiempo atrás desea iniciar con su propio negocio, quiere aprovechar el espacio que tiene en su casa para poder construir un galpón de pollos, comenta que tiene experiencia de familiares en este negocio y les ha ido muy bien. Por ello con este dinero podrá comprar pollitos, balanceado y construir el galpón, desea iniciar con esta actividad ya que necesita reforzar sus ingresos porque al no contar con el padre de sus hijas necesita más apoyo, porque una de sus pequeñas tiene discapacidad y necesita mayor cuidado y una educación especial.
Kerly se siente agradecida con KIVA porque podrá iniciar con su propio negocio, gracias a su apoyo.
texts.en:
In the town of Libertad del Toachi, an area dedicated to raising chickens, pigs and cattle, lives Kerly a 45 year old woman with two daughters. They have lived in a relative's house for several years. 

Kerly is a teacher in a school in town. She has been working for many years in the same area, because she can be with her daughters in the afternoons.  Kerly has had a dream for some time about starting her own business. She wants to take advantage of the space she has at her home to build a shed for chickens. She remarks that she has experience from family members in the business and it has gone well for them. That is why, with this money, she will be able to buy chicks and balanced feed as well as build the shed. She wants to start this activity because she needs to reinforce her income. Since she isn't with the father of her daughters, she needs more help, One of her daughters is handicapped and she needs more care and special education.  

Kerly is grateful to KIVA because she will be able to start her own business, thanks to your support.

loans.use: to strt her business raising chickens. With this income, she will help one of her daughters who is handicapped and needs more care.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.es:
Romeo, de 71 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, estudio hasta sexto grado, creció con sus padres, quienes le enseñaron estas actividades, está casado y su esposa es quien le ayuda con las tareas de la casa. 

Romeo, tiene varios años dedicándose a la agricultura, se levanta a las 04:00 a.m. para ir a las parcelas donde trabaja durante la mañana, mientras su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen.

Romeo, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como pesticidas, semilla y abono, para sus cultivos y de esa manera asegurar una buena cosecha. 

Romeo, sueña con tener más ganado de ordeño para incrementar la producción de leche.
texts.en:
Romeo is 71 years old. He works in agriculture and livestock. He went to school up the sixth grade and was raised by his parents who taught him these activities. He is married and his wife helps him with the housework.

Romeo has been working in agriculture for several years. He gets up at 4:00 a.m. to go to his land where he works all morning, while his wife works in the home and cares for the cows they own.

Romeo needs the loan to buy agricultural materials  for his crops, such as pesticide, seed and fertilizer. This way, he will ensure a good harvest. 

Romeo dreams of have more dairy cattle to increase milk production.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as pesticide, seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Leili Jeaneth

texts.es:
Leili, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada, su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, ella se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. junto a su esposo,  para realizar las actividades diarias. 

Leili, se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura durante la mañana y su pareja le ayuda en la parcela que alquila; y en el transcurso de la tarde se dedican a ordeñar las vacas y a preparar quesos para venderlos entre sus vecinos. 

Leili, necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca, de esa manera ella podrá aumentar la producción de leche y podrá hacer más quesos.  

Leili, sueña con aumentar la venta de la leche  y comprar más ganado para producir más leche.
texts.en:
Leili is 45 years old. She went to school up to the ninth grade. She is married and her spouse works in agriculture and livestock. She gets up at 4:30 a.m. with her husband to do the daily activities.  

Leili does agricultural work in the morning on the land she rents and in the afternoon she milks cows and makes cheeses to sell to neighbors.

Leili needs the loan to buy a cow. That way, she can increase milk production and she can make more cheese. 

Leili dreams of increasing milk sales and buying more cattle to produce more milk.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Edgar Antonio

texts.es:
Edgar, de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen dos hijos, que estudian y viven con ellos.

Edgar, es ganadero, comenzó a comprar y a vender ganado desde hace 5 años, aprendió este trabajo con su padre que también es ganadero, pero además de eso también siembra maíz; antes solo le ayudaba a su padre en la ganadería; su lugar de trabajo está a 100 metros desde su casa y su horario es desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 12:00 m.d.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una vaca, este préstamos le ayudara a tener más ganado para su negocio.

Él, sueña con comprar más ganado, para tener venta de leche y además espera que sus hijos se preparen academicamente.
texts.en:
Edgar, 36 years old, studied up to secondary school, is married and his wife is a homemaker, they have two children, who go to school and live with them. 

Edgar is a cattle rancher, he began to buy and sell cattle 5 years ago, he learned this trade with his father who is also a cattle rancher, but besides that he also grows corn; before, he only used to help his father with the cattle; his workplace is 100 meters from his house and his schedule is from 6:00 a.m. until 12:00 noon.

He needs the loan to buy a cow, this loan will help him have more cattle for his business. 

He dreams of buying more cattle, to sell milk and in addition he hopes that his children become academically prepared.

loans.use: buy a cow.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Alex is aged 42 years, married to Agnes and supports four children. He has been a farmer for the last 10 years, and the business earns him KES 9,500. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to enable him to get a better harvest for family use and for sale of the surplus in the market. 

Alex plans to use gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and repay the loan. His hope is to offer better education and medication to his family members and expand his agricultural sector.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to enable him to get a better harvest for family use and for sale of the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Nour

texts.en:
Nour is a 29-year-old, single woman living with her parents and three siblings. They all cooperate and work together to fulfill their needs and be able to live a respectful life. 

She has eight years of experience working as a hairdresser and beautician, and since 2014, she decided to start her own job and opened a beauty salon in her town, where she greets her customers with a great smile. 

Today, Nour wants to get a second loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase hairdressing and beauty tools and chairs. She feels like she is meant to work in such a business and states that she is very happy.

loans.use: to purchase hairdressing and beauty tools and chairs

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor de 69 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar. Víctor a pesar de que es una persona de avanzada edad no le impide que día con día se le levante con el deseo de salir a trabajar, el se dedica a la albañilería desde hace mucho tiempo y además realiza la actividad de compra y venta de ganado y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Víctor durante toda su vida siempre ha luchado por proteger a su familia y por qué su casa se vea cada día mas bonita es por ello que con ese propósito  a decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para comprar un portón nuevo y luego colocarlo  en su vivienda ya que el que tiene actualmente se encuentra en muy malas condiciones debido a su antigüedad y no le brinda mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en: Victor who is 69 years old lives in his own home with his family. Victor's advancing years do not prevent him from getting up every day ready to go out to work. He has worked for a long time as a bricklayer. He also has a business buying and selling livestock to help support his family with the household expenses. Throughout his life Victor has always fought to protect his family and make his home more beautiful everyday . For this reason he has decided to ask for loan from FUSAI to buy a new front door and place it in his home. The existing door is old and in very poor condition and does not provide much security for his family.

loans.use: to buy a new front door for his home.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, de 42 años de edad, madre de 3 hijos, logro cursar un 2do grado debido a la condicion económica de su familia no pudo continuar con sus estudios, sus hijos uno esta estudia 7 grado en la escuela de la comunidad y los otros dos uno ya se separo de la familia y el otro es menor de edad su compañero de vida se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura.

María desde muy pequeña se a dedicado al negocio ya que le ayudaba a su madre en la venta  de antojos como la yuca, enchilada y otros en las canchas de fútbol y de casa en casa, ademas tenia  una pequeña tienda, la cual administraba su madre, actualmente tiene una tienda en su casa de productos de primera necesidad, sodas y refrescos ya que en ese lugar es bien transitado, su compañero de vida le ayuda por las tardes cuando a regresado de trabajar, quien se desempeña como jornalero

El crédito sera utilizado en la compra de productos  que les hacen falta,  y que le piden las personas que transitan en ese lugar.

María sueña con sacar adelante a su hijo, prepararlo académica mente para que pueda tener una vida digna y un mejor estatus económico
texts.en:
María, who is 42 years old and the mother of three children, managed to study as far as second grade but because of the family's financial situation she was not able to continue with her education. One of her children is in 7th grade at the community school and of the other two, one has already moved away and the other is still a minor. Her life partner makes a living working in agriculture. 

From being a young girl, María has worked in business, as she used to help her mother in selling snacks such as cassava, enchiladas [meat-filled tortillas] and other items at football pitches and from door to door. They also had a small shop which her mother ran. Now she has a shop in her house selling basic necessities, fizzy drinks and soft drinks since she gets a lot of passing trade. Her life partner helps her in the afternoons when he has returned from work. He works as a day labourer.

The loan will be used for buying products which they need and which are requested by the people who pass by the shop. María's dream is to help her son get on in life and to give him an education so that he can have a decent life and a better financial status.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her shop.

loans.name: Nery Adonay

texts.es:
Nery, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, no está casado y no tiene hijos, trabaja de agricultor en la zona y viven con su mamá y dos hermanos.

Nery, se dedica a la siembra de maíz desde hace 8 años, porque desde pequeño se crió con su familia y los cultivos los prepara junto a sus hermanos.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas como pesticidas, herbicidas y semilla para sembrar maíz.

Nery, siempre a soñado con tener su propia casa y su propia familia.
texts.en:
Nery, age 25, went to school through the ninth grade.  He isn’t married and doesn’t have any children.  He works as a farmer in the local area and lives with his mother and two sisters.

For eight years, Nery has worked growing corn. From a young age he was raised with his family, and he cared for the plants alongside his siblings.

He needs this loan to buy agricultural supplies such as pesticides, herbicides, and seed for sowing corn.

Nery has always dreamed of having his own house and his own family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as pesticides, herbicides, and seeds for sowing corn.

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la albañilería y a la agricultura, tiene 3 hijos pequeños.

Lucia, tiene 8 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, aprendió este oficio con su pareja; antes se dedicaba solo a los oficios domésticos, la parcela donde trabajan está en el mismo cantón y para llegar se van caminando.

El crédito sera invertido para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, semilla y pesticidas.

El sueño de Lucia, es remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Lucia, who is 24 years old, studied as far as fifth grade. She has a partner and he makes a living as a bricklayer and in agriculture. She has 3 small children. Lucia has been working in agriculture for 8 years and learnt the skills with her partner. Before that she just took care of the domestic tasks. The plot of land where they work is in the same district and they get there on foot. 

The loan will be used to buy agricultural supplies such as manure, seeds and pesticides. Lucia's dream is to refurbish her home.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as manure, seeds and pesticides.

loans.name: Lloyd

texts.es: LLOYD: Es un señor cordial y luchador de 36 años de edad, originario de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Está casado, tiene 3 hijos: 2 en edad escolar y una menor de edad. Su esposa es ama de casa. Solicita financiamiento para solventar gastos universitarios de su hija mayor que estudia 3er año de enfermería. El sueña con construir su vivienda de concreto y seguir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Lloyd:  He is a cordial and hardworking, 36-year-old man.  He comes from Bilwi, in the city of Puerto Cabezas.  He is married and has three children: two are school-aged and one is younger.  His spouse is a housewife.  

He is asking for a loan to pay for his oldest daughter’s university expenses.  She is a third year Nursing student.  

He dreams of building a home made out of concrete and continuing to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for his oldest daughter's university expenses as she completes her third year of nursing school.

loans.name: Majidu

texts.en:
Majidu is a male who is married with five children, all attending school. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. He deals in electronics spare parts, and he gets his side income from a motorcycle transport business. He began the business to get money to educate his children and provide them with the basic needs.

He is a hardworking man whose business dream is exploring the new markets with more attractive prices. 

Majidu intends to use the loan to buy electronics spare parts for selling.

loans.use: to buy electronics spare parts for selling.

loans.name: Rina Lisseth

texts.es:
Rina, de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, no continuo estudiando por que en su cantón solo hasta ese grado había, es madre sotera, pues el papá de su niño, la abandonó cuando estaba embarazada y ahora vive con su mamá y un sobrino.

Rina, se dedica al trabajo del campo, específicamente siembra maíz, frijol y maicillo, este oficio lo aprendió con su cuñado, porque su papa murió cuando ella tenía 5 años de edad.- Ahora, desde hace unos años vende ropa de manera ambulante, la necesidad de sacar a su hijo adelante la llevo a realizar este trabajo, ella vende 3 días por semana y lo hace en los caseríos y cantones cercanos, su horario es de 8:00 a.m. hasta las 3:00 p.m. y cuando no va a vender trabaja en la agricultura o lavando ropa ajena. 

El crédito sera invertido para comprar ropa como faldas, blusas, pantalones y ropa interior para mujeres y hombres. 

Su sueño es construir su propia casa y tambien sueña con tener un bazar en el pueblo.
texts.en: Rina is 21 years old. She studied up to sixth grade. She did not continue attending school because school went only up to that grade in her canton. She is a single mother because the father of her son abandoned her when she was pregnant, and now she lives with her mother and a nephew. Rina works in the fields. Specifically, she grows corn, beans and sorghum. She learned this job from her brother in law, because she was 5 years old when her father died. Now, for some years she has been selling clothes as a street vendor. The need to support her son made her start this job. She sells 3 days a week in the nearby villages and cantons. Her schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. When she is not selling, she works in agriculture or washing clothes for other people. She will invest the loan to buy clothes such as skirts, pants and underwear for women and men. Her dream is to build her own house and she also dreams of having a bazaar in town.

loans.use: to buy clothes such as skirts, blouses, pants and underwear for women and men.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Faridah

texts.en: Faridah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is a single mother of six children, five of whom attend school. She takes care of additional family members. She lives in her own house, and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her major expenses include food and school fees.For seven years, she has sold used clothes at the market. She gets additional income from poultry farming. She works six days a week. Faridah has requested a loan from Micro Credit for Development and Transformation SACCO to buy a bale of used clothes. In the future, she would like to buy more land to expand her poultry farming business.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes

loans.name: Daysi Lissette

texts.es:
Daysi, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta un 7º grado, madre soltera  sus hijos uno de 6 y el otro de un año no asisten a la escuela hasta el próximo año vive en casa de su madre con sus dos hijos.

Daysi, se a dedicado a trabajar con su madre desde que estaba muy pequeña en la compra y venta de peses ya que a poca distancia de su casa hay una laguna donde sustraen este producto y después con su compañero de vida espesaron un negocio de compra y venta de verduras y pescado fresco luego este la abandono, pero siguió trabajando por su cuenta vendiendo estos productos todos los días de casa en casa y en los cantones aledaños desde la mañana, hasta que termina el producto.

El crédito sera utilizados en la compra de productos para la venta de su tienda, y ademas quiere mejorar la infraestructura donde esta ubicada la tienda.

El sueño de Daysi, es Sacar adelante a sus hijos, que puedan estudiar y prepararse y también quiere poner un negocio de elaboración de pupusas.
texts.en:
Daysi, who is 26 years old, studied as far as 7th grade. She is a single mother and her sons, a 6-year-old and one-year-old, do not go to school until next year. She lives in her mother's house with her two sons. 

From when she was very little Daysi has worked with her mother buying and selling fish, since there is a lagoon a short distance from their house where they net the fish. Later on she and her life partner opened a business buying and selling vegetables and fresh fish. Then he left her, but she continued working on her own selling this produce every day from door to door and in the neighbouring cantons, starting in the morning until she sells out. 

The loan will be used to buy products to sell in her shop, and she also wants to improve the infrastructure where the shop is located. 

Daysi's dream is to give her children a good start in life and for them to be able to study and have an education. She also wants to set up a business making pupusas [thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans]

loans.use: to buy products for the shop and improve the structure of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: ELLA ES UNA JOVEN SEÑORA CASADA, MADRE DE 3 HIJOS UNA DE SUS HIJAS  SUFRE DE PROBLEMAS DENTALES Y OCUPA UN TRATAMIENTO DE ORTODONCIA, SUS DIENTES SE ENCUENTRAN DESALINEADOS LO QUE CAUSA QUE LA NIÑA SEA OBJETO DE BURLA EN SU ESCUELA. LA SITUACIÓN ECONÓMICA FAMILIAR ES ALGO DIFÍCIL EL ÚNICO INGRESO ES EL DE SU ESPOSO.
texts.en: This young woman is married and has three children.  One of her daughters suffers from dental problems and is concerned about orthodontic treatment.  Her daughter's teeth are misaligned, which causes her to be the object of teasing at her school.  The family financial situation is somewhat difficult; the only income is from her husband.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
Ella es madre soltera de 25 años tiene un bebe de 2 años y es el único sostén de su casa y de su hijo. Trabaja en una fabrica como empleada. Necesita realizarse un tratamiento dental ya que desde hace varios años tiene problemas en su boca esto debido a que de niña sufrió una enfermedad y a lo largo de su vida tomó medicamentos que provocaron que sus dientes se dañaran. Esto le causa mucha molestia, además de pena al no tener una sonrisa agradable.
Nunca se trato el problema ya que el tratamiento es costoso y se le complica pagar.
De realizarse el tratamiento ella tendría la posibilidad de conseguir un mejor empleo ya que considera que la sonrisa es muy importe.
texts.en:
She is a 25 year old single mother.  She has a two year old baby, and she is the sole support of her household and her child.  She works as an employee at a factory.

She needs to have dental treatment.  She has had problems in her mouth for several years because she had a disease as a girl, and throughout her life she had to take medicine that damaged her teeth.  This really bothers her, and it distresses her not to have a nice smile.

The problem was never treated because the treatment is expensive, and it is difficult for her to pay for.  Upon getting the treatment she would have the chance of getting a better job because she feels that your smile is very important.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Thomson

texts.en:
Thomson is 78 years old, married and blessed with two children. He is a small scale farmer earning an income of KES 10,000 per month.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a cow to supplement his farming activities. He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and repay his loan. 

His future hope is to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a cow to supplement his farming activities.

loans.name: Eang's Group

texts.en: Eang, a farmer living in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia, is 33 years old and a mother of two children. She earns income to support her family’s expenses by rice farming. Her daily income is about 43,000 KHR, and she is able to save around 13,000 KHR each day. She has been involved in farming for fifteen years. Her rice does not grow well, so she has to sell it at a low price. For Eang, this is her fourth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans. Her past loans helped to improve her family's living conditions. She leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, seed and pesticide to support her farm. She hopes that she can get more income than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed and pesticide to support her farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 60 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en casa propia junto a dos hijos mayores de edad quienes trabajan y aportan para suplir las necesidades básicas del hogar. Ángela se dedica a la realización de oficios varios desde hace bastante tiempo y eso le ha permitido obtener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante día con día. Ángela  desea mejorar su vivienda pero debido a que no cuenta con el capital necesario para realizar las mejoras no ha logrado cumplir con sus objetivos, es por ello que con el motivo y el deseo de repellar las paredes de su vivienda a tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para poder invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios que son: cemento, arena y además el pago de la mano de obra para poder repellar las paredes de su casa y brindar a su familia un hogar más digno.
texts.en:
Ángela, age 60, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her two grown children.  They work and contribute to the basic household necessities.

Ángela has been doing various jobs for some time.  This has allowed her to get the income needed to get ahead day to day.

Ángela wishes to improve her house.  However, because she does not have the needed capital to make the improvements, she has not managed to meet her objectives.  She wishes to plaster the walls of her house.  That is the reason she has made the decision to request a loan from FUSAI.  With the loan she will be able to buy the materials needed.  She will buy cement and sand, and she will also pay for the labor to be able to plaster the walls of her house.  This will provide her family with a more decent house.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand and to pay for the labor to be able to plaster the walls of her house.

loans.name: Sarin's Group

texts.en: A resident living in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia, Sarin is 51 years old and a mother of five children. To support her family’s living condition, she grows rice as her single main source of income. Her daily income earns about 51,000 KHR, and she is able to save around 10,000 KHR each day. Her rice does not grow well, which is the main challenge in her business. For Sarin, this is her fourth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans. Her past loans helped her to improve her living condition. In a group of five members, she is the group leader. She will use her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seed to support her farm. She hopes she can get more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seed to support her farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Vruyr

texts.en:
Vryur is 29 years old, and he lives in the city of Kapan in the Syunik region. Vruyr lives separately from his parents. He has higher polytechnic education, and now he works at the electric networks as an engineer. 

Vryur is very happy and also a little bit impatient. Vryur has a very nice bride-to-be. He made his proposal of marriage to her, and soon they are going to get married. Vryur imagines a very beautiful and cheerful wedding party. This loan Vryur requests for the organization of his wedding party, and he hopes that Kiva lenders will help him to make that day one of the happiest and most unforgettable days for his future wife and for himself as well.

loans.use: to organize his wedding party

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine lives in the frontier village Aknaghbyur of Tavush region with her son and mother-in-law. She is a widow and after the loss of her husband, Karine realized the importance of being strong-willed and ready to overcome any hardships in order to provide good living conditions for their single son. Now he is already 16 years old, and he is a very clever and kind young man who appreciates his mother’s great efforts and difficulties through which Karine passed.  She did this in order to give him the best, and anything he needed from the time he was a small boy until now, when he is a handsome young man. 

Karine is a farmer and she has a cow and chickens on her farm. She also has a great greenhouse which she built herself, little by little, until she managed to have a big, very nice greenhouse. She also has a vegetable garden and an orchard in the open air. So with her farm products such as milk, poultry and eggs, she also sells her land’s goods such as tomatoes, greens, beans, cucumbers and peppers, also apples, figs and mulberries. 

Karine asks for a loan from Kiva lenders to develop swine breeding; she plan to buy several piglets, a heifer and also fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy several piglets, a heifer and also fodder for her farm cattle in order to develop swine breeding

loans.name: Tho's Group

texts.en:
Tho is 46 years old and has one child. She is a resident of Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district. She grows cassava, which she has been doing for 28 years. Her business earns around 46,000 KHR per day and she is able to save about 14,000 KHR each day after offsetting her business expenses. She faces the challenge of low prices for cassava. 

Tho is the group leader of her group of five. She requested her fourth loan from VisionFund, which she will use to  buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide to support her cassava farm.  Her past loans helped her to earn a decent income to improve her family. She hopes that she can get more income to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide to support her cassava farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Payiskan

texts.ru: Пайискан, 61 год, вдова, мать 6 детей. У нее - среднее образование, сейчас на пенсии. В поисках дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1986 году, благодаря упорному труду Пайискан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 8 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Пайискан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации молока. Доходы от кредита Пайискан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества породистых дойных коров.
texts.en:
Payiskan is 61 years old, a widow, and the mother of six. She has completed secondary education. She is receiving a state pension now. As an additional source of income for her family, Payiskan raises livestock and grows farm crops, having started this business in 1986. Thanks to Payiskan’s hard work, she now has two cows and eight sheep on her farm. 

In order to develop her business further, Payiskan has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance association for a loan in the amount of 40,000 KGS to buy a dairy cow and increase the volume of milk sales. Payiskan plans to use the resulting revenues in an additional increase of pedigree dairy cows.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow in order to increase the volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
Angela is seller from the Ungheni region. She is a 42-year-old widow. She has two children, a boy and a girl. Her boy is 19 years old and invalid, and Angela takes care of him.  

Angela has been seller for 14 years. She sells at the open air market spices, grains and fruits. She will use the loan to buy spices and grains to sell and to increase the stock of goods. 

As the result of this loan, Angela's income will increase and she will be able to improve living conditions for her son.

loans.use: To buy spices and grains for selling

loans.name: Qila Bhattian 2 Group

texts.en:
Ghulam is a hardworking 31-year-old young farmer living in the village of Qila Bhattian, located in district Gujranwala, Pakistan. He has five family members. He is raising his hand in this photo, holding a booklet. 

For last many years Ghulam has been in the business of farming, mainly growing wheat and rice in his agri farm. 

He has completed three loan cycles with JWS and paid all repayments timely. He got a lot of training on crop management from the plate farm of his lender. His dream is to increase his crop output and give a better education to his children.

He and his group members are requesting a loan to buy quality seeds, fertilizer, fuel and pesticides for their rice crop. Ghulam is the leader of a group of four members. This loan will help them to increase their farm output.

He will be grateful to the lenders, and promises to repay the loan without any delay.

loans.use: To purchase agriculture inputs i.e. fertilizer, pesticide, seeds, fuel etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fuel and tires.

loans.name: Evenecer Group

texts.es:
Existen distintas comunidades en el Estado de México en donde los habitantes tienen rasgos culturales y sociales muy tradicionales. De igual forma son personas muy trabajadoras cuya principal actividad económica es la venta de productos para el hogar, para ello realizan viajes a otras localidades ya que es la manera de extender su mercado.
   En una de estas comunidades se formó el grupo Evenecer cuyo significado es “Dios está aquí” debido a que sus integrantes tienen una gran fe y respeto por sus creencias. 
   Desde muy pequeña Maricela ha tenido un gran interés por sobresalir en la vida y, aunque aún es muy joven, ella está  muy enfocada en todos sus proyectos. Actualmente vive con sus padres y gracias a ellos decidió dedicarse a la venta de artículos para el hogar ya que es la actividad que desempeñan desde hace varios años. De igual forma emprendió la venta de tortillas debido a que es un alimento muy tradicional y típico en la región, “en ninguna mesa mexicana debe faltar la tortilla” comenta con entusiasmo. Por ahora Maricela no cuenta con un terreno para sembrar maíz pero su préstamo le ayuda a comprar maíz y gas. 
   Hoy en día Maricela se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida porque con las ganancias tiene la oportunidad de apoyar a sus padres con los gastos familiares. Por otro lado tiene el sueño de seguir mejorando su negocio hasta el punto de poder dar empleo a otras personas. La mayor motivación para ella es que tiene clientes constantes que la ayudan a conseguir sus metas.
   Las demás integrantes del grupo son Ma. de los Ángeles quien invertirá en borregos; Albino, en ropa; Alicia y Amelia, en jarcieria y Josefina, en una tortillería.

*La fotografía fue tomada en la comunidad donde viven los integrantes, Maricela es quien porta el sombrero negro*
texts.en:
There are distinct communities in the State of Mexico where the inhabitants have very traditional cultural and social characteristics. In the same way they are very hard-working people whose main economic activity is the sale of products for the home. For that they make journeys to other places as that is a way of expanding their market.
The group Evenecer was formed in one of these communities. It means 'God is here', because its members have huge faith and respect for their beliefs.
Since she was very young, Maricela has had a great interest in getting ahead in life and, although she is still young, she is very focused on all of her projects. Currently she lives with her parents and thanks to them decided to make a living selling items for the home as that is the activity which they have performed for a number of years. In that way she learned to sell tortillas as that is a very traditional, typical food in the region. They say enthusiastically that "tortillas should be missing from no Mexican table". For now Maricela does not have land for sowing corn but her loan will help her to buy corn and gas.
These days Maricela is very content and grateful because with the profits she has the opportunity to support her parents with the family expenses. On the other hand she dreams of continuing to improve her business to the point where she can employ other people. The biggest motivation for her is that she has regular customers who help her to achieve her goals.
The other members of the group are Ma. de los Ángeles who will invest in sheep; Albino, in clothing; Alicia and Amelia, in household products, and Josefina, in a tortillería.
*The photo was taken in the community where the members live. Maricela is the one wearing the black hat.*

loans.use: to buy corn and gas.

location.town: San Agustin Mextepec, San Felipe del progreso

loans.name: Mriwa

texts.en:
Mriwa is a married woman with two school-going children. They live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

Mriwa has operated a khanga (women's wrap cloth) business, selling from home and door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of khangas for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase bales of khangas for resale

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is aged 37 years and he supports 2 children. 

He has been a shop keeper for the last 23 years and the business earns him KES 16,000 per month.
 
He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase more products for his grocery shop to meet both his family and client needs. 

He plans to use gained profits to repay the loan and educate his children. 

His hope is to be financially stable and expand his business to eventually be a supermarket.

loans.use: To purchase more products such as maize flour, cooking oil and soap to sell to clients and meet both family and client needs.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
