Mimin is the one who is seen in the photo. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases for members of her local community.

loans.name: Yaya

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Yaya. Yaya lives in Sumedang, located about four hour’s drive from Jakarta. He owns a small stall where he sells small snacks and drinks and provides mobile payment services for his community. Yaya is happily married and together with his wife they have two sons and one daughter. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to expand his business in technology, as well as give more contribution to his community. 

With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Yaya sees improvements in his business. As the business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide more mobile payment services for his community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Yaya improves his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services. 

Yaya is the one who is seen in the photo. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to give his community better access to communication and financial services by selling mobile airtime credits and providing bill payment services.

loans.name: Esih

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Esih. Esih lives in Sumedang, located about four hour’s drive from Jakarta. She owns a small stall where she sells mobile airtime credits and mobile phone's accessories for his community. Esih is happily married and together with her husband, they have three children. She decided to join Ruma because she wants to expand her business in technology. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Esih sees improvements in her business. 

As the business grows, she is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the loan to provide more mobile airtime credits for her community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Esih improves her business and accordingly, her community who needs access to such services. Esih is the one who is seen in the photo. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to give her community better access to communication services by selling mobile airtime credits.

loans.name: Gedion

texts.en:
Gedion is 26 years old and lives in Labuyo, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. Gedion is engaged in managing a motor repair shop and also sell spare parts and lubricants of motorcycle that gives him earnings of approximately PHP 15,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional inventory of spare parts and lubricants for his motor repair shop business.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory of spare parts, etc. for his motor repair shop business.

loans.name: Las Lomas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS LOMAS” iniciará el octavo quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rufina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ropa, venta de fruta, venta de dulces, venta de refrescos, venta de comida, venta de artefactos, venta de coca, venta de dulces.
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rufina es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años de una vecina.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que brinda la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Lomas" will start its 85th cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Focal Center of the Andes.  It is composed of eight members and it is directed by a board of directors of which Rufina is the president.  The businesses engaged in by the members of the communal bank are various among which are: clothing sales, fruit sales, candy sales, refreshment sales, food sales, artifact sales, and coca sales.
The loan they will take out will benefit small micro-entrepreneurs of which Rufina is one.  She indicates that it has been four years since she joined Pro Mujer, coming in at the invitation of a friend who is a customer of the institution.  Nowadays she has a clothing sales business and she wants it to be known that she learned this business several years ago from a neighbor.
The loan which she will take out now is to augment her capital (to buy clothing wholesale) which she will get from the wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz and then will sell it in her sales stall.  The is kind of work allows her to generate resources in order to support her family economically since she is single and has three children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that what she likes is the training and the health area that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Edwil

texts.en:
Edwil landed at a right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. She knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet, when went broke after her first business went bad. 

PMPC came as a rescue for her by lending her money when she needed it the most. Now, she has availed another loan purchase additional inventories of spare parts and electronic parts of her shop. Edwil perseveres and always believes in reaching her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventories of spare parts and electronic parts for her shop.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte together with her two children of adult age.  She has successfully repaid her whole loan, which she used to restock her sari-sari store business.

She wants to renovate their house, so that they can have a comfortable and decent house to live in. Recently, she availed another loan of PHP 20,000 to buy building materials, paints, and to pay workers.

loans.use: to buy building materials, paints and to pay workers.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a businesswoman who earns through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance. 

Recently, she applied for a loan of PHP 8,000 to pay for a motorcycle unit for her motorcycle transport business.

loans.use: to pay for a motorcycle unit.

loans.name: St Kagwa Women Group

texts.en: Florance is 32 years old. She is married with 4 children, 3 of which are attending school, and live in Kasese, Uganda. Florance is a member of St Kagwa Women Group which is among the best-performing groups in the company. Florance owns a general merchandise shop and earns additional income from rental houses and growing crops. Florance started her business in 2007 and works 8 hours a day, six days a week. She is honest and that's why she is a trusted member of the group. Despite this, she is faced with high market competition. She is requesting a loan to buy sugar, cooking oil, rice, and other merchandise for selling.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking oil, rice, and other merchandise for selling.

loans.name: María Patricia

texts.en: Maria Patricia is a Kubo Financiero client. This is her third loan with us and she has always paid on time. Maria Patricia is asking for a loan to continue buying groceries to restock her store.

loans.use: to stock up her business by buying wholesale and taking advantage of discounts

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo,  se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros, desde hace 4 años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando por cuarta ocasión un crédito para comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior de diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The young woman, whose face has been pixelated because she is 22 years old and lives in a dangerous area, works selling underwear for men and women.  She has worked doing this for the past four years and she has many loyal customers.  With her earnings, she is able to cover some of her household expenses.  She lives with her family in a home that they own.

She is now seeking her fourth loan to purchase a large quantity of clothing at different prices, and in different styles and colors.  This way, she will be able to attract more customers and therefore, improve her quality of life.

loans.use: purchase a large amount of underwear at different prices, and in different styles and colors.

loans.name: Blanca Nelly

texts.es:
Blanca, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, debido a la condición económica de sus padres no pudo seguir sus estudios, está casada, su esposo trabaja como docente y ella es madre de una niña de 3 años de edad.

Blanca, por el momento solo se dedica a los oficios domésticos, antes trabajaba con la empresa Avon.
   
Blanca, necesita el financiamiento para comprar ropa interior para damas, caballeros, niños y camisas para caballero para vender, este crédito le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida, porque tendrá mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares.

Los sueños de Blanca, son seguir estudiando para lograr sacar una carrera universitaria que le permita tener un ingreso fijo; también quiere construir otra vivienda cerca de la cuidad, para tener mejores oportunidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
Blanca is 28 years old, and has a high school education.  Due to her family's financial situation, she was unable to continue her education. She is now married and her husband works as a teacher. She is the mother of a three year old daughter.  At the moment, Blanca is a homemaker, although she used to work for Avon.  

Blanca is in need of a loan to purchase underwear for women, men and children, as wells as men's shirts to resell. This loan will allow her to improve her quality of life because she will have an income with which to contribute to her family's expenses.  Blanca's dreams are to continue her education so that she can earn a college degree that will allow her to have a steady income, and to build a home close to the city so that they have better job opportunities.

loans.use: purchase underwear for ladies, men and children, as well as shirts for men.

loans.name: Amosse

texts.pt:
Amosse de 38 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude é residente de Magude na casa própria, vive maritalmente e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a escola, cuida além dos filhos a sua mãe e seu irmão.
Com o presente financiamento dos 20.000 irá comprar capulanas e bacias para reforçar seu volume de mercadoria.
Tem como sonho construir uma casa grande e convencional para seus filhos.
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao negócio, trabalho e ao crédito para a solução dos seus pendentes.
texts.en:
Amosse is 38 years old. He comes from the district of Magude and lives there in a house that he owns. He's in a common law marriage and has four children who are in school. Aside from his children he also takes care of his mother and brother.
With the current loan for 20,000mts he'll purchase basins and traditional skirts in order to stock up on merchandise.
His dream is to build a big, conventional house for his children.
His difficulty is the lack of funds. However, he has been turning to his business, his work and credit as a way to settle his affairs.

loans.use: to purchase basins and traditional skirts so he can stock up on merchandise.

loans.name: Kely

texts.es:
Kely tiene 33 años de edad, vive con sus padres y su menor hijo en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Kely se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Kely espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Kely is 33 years old. She lives in the family home with her parents and her minor son in the rural zone of the district of Cayaltí, situated in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this district make a living primarily from agriculture, livestock raising, and commerce. 
Kely makes her living raising and selling small animals such as chickens, hens, ducks, and turkeys among other things.  She has five years experience in this business, and has very good personal and professional references in the area.
The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase a greater number of animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, and chickens among other things, as well as to buy balanced feed for these animals.
With this, Kely hopes to offer a better product to her customers, which will allow her to generate greater income and ultimately improve her quality of life and that of her family

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals as well as balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Mirna Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mirna, de 43 años de edad,  estudio hasta quinto grado, no siguió estudiando para ayudar a su madre por que sus hermanas ya no vivían con ellas, esta acompañada, su pareja se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado de repasto.

Mirna se dedica a la crianza de animales de granja( pollos de engorde) esto se lo enseño su madre quien también se dedicaba a esta actividad, esto lo ha hecho desde hace 5 años ya tiene 3 pequeñas jaulas, su compañero de vida le ayuda cuando los va a vender ya que los hace por libra para poder venderlo con mas facilidad.

El crédito serán utilizados para la compra de 300 pollitos de engorde, también para comprar concentrado para la alimentación de los mismos y arreglar la galera donde tiene los animales.

El sueño de  Mirna es que el negocio siga creciendo para obtener mayores ganancias y asi mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mirna is 43 years old and has a fifth grade education.  She was unable to continue attending school because she had to help her mother since her sisters no longer lived at home with them. She is now married and her husband works in agriculture and raising livestock.  Mira works raising chickens, a trade that she learned from her mother who also worked in this field.  She has been raising chickens for five years and she now has 3 small pens.  Her husband helps her when she goes to sell them, which she does by the pound since it is easier that way.

This loan will be used to purchase 300 chickens as well as to purchase feed and materials to repair the henhouses.  Mina's dream is for her business to continue growing so that she can increase her earnings and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: purchase 300 chickens to raise, feed, and materials to repair her henhouses.

loans.name: Eva

texts.pt:
Eva de 33 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude é residente de Magude na casa própria, divorciada e mãe de 2 filhos menores de idade frequentando o ensino primário.
Com o presente financiamento de 15.000 irá pagar a mão-de-obra do pedreiro para a construção a sua casa.
Tem como sonhos construir a sua casa e abrir um negócio rentável para aumentar a renda familiar.
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao trabalho e ao crédito para a solução dos seus pendentes.
texts.en:
Eva is 33 years old. She comes from the district of Magude and lives there in a house that she owns. She's divorced and has two underage children who are in primary school.
With the current loan for 15,000mts she'll pay for her mason's labor so that she can get her house built.
Eva's dream is to build her house and open a profitable business in order to improve her family's income.
Her difficulty is the lack of funds, but she has been turning to work and credit as a way to settle her affairs.

loans.use: to pay for her mason's labor so she can get her house built.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
José de 53 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Monapo em Nampula, é residente de Magude na casa própria, casado e pai de 3 filhos maiores de idade, vive com apenas dois deles, um deles vive com a mãe.
Com o presente financiamento de 12.000 irá comprar capulanas para revender.
Tem como sonhos ver seu negócio a crescer e quem sabe no futuro ter um restaurante para poder ajudar a sua família.
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao negócio e ao crédito para a solução dos seus pendentes.
texts.en:
José is 53 years old and comes from the district of Monapo in Nampula. He lives in Magude in a house that he owns. He's married and has three adult children. He only lives with two of his children, as one of them lives with their mother.
With the current loan for 12,000mts he'll purchase traditional skirts for re-selling.
José's dream is to see his business grow and maybe someday own a restaurant so that he can support his family.
His difficulty is the lack of funds, but he's been turning to his business and credit as a way to settle his affairs.

loans.use: to purchase traditional skirts for re-selling.

loans.name: Caryl

texts.en: Caryl thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group of Paglaum MPC. She decided to give it a try after she learned she can avail financial assistance for her chosen business. Caryl has maintained her membership in good standing, without records of default up to this day. She has taken several loans and all were repaid in a timely manner. Recently, she availed of a loan to purchase bags of feeds. Caryl wishes to continuously manage her business more effectively with the support of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bags of animal feeds for her hog-raising business.

loans.name: Gresilda

texts.en: Gresilda is 54 years old and resides in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She is single and lives with her parents. She joined PMPC in 2010 in order to access the programs and services of the said co-op. Previously, she had availed loans for the construction of her new house. Currently, she's accessing her ninth loan in the amount of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional inventory for selling monggo bean sprouts to the local community.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for selling monggo bean sprouts.

loans.name: Veras

texts.en: Nestor is a widow and lives with his son. He is a retired government employee and has received a monthly pension. He asked for a loan to purchase maintenance medicines. He is very grateful that he can still receive loans from the cooperative despite his age.

loans.use: to purchase maintenance medicines

loans.name: Toese

texts.en:
Toese is a 52-year-old mother with four children. She owns and operates a small business selling pancakes, pork cakes and buns in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than two years. 

Toese requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon and a fry pan to assist her in running the business. She hopes to use her profit to build a small bakery store in the near future. She joined SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon and a fry pan.

loans.name: Lino

texts.pt:
Lino de 34 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude, é residente de Magude na casa própria mas construída no espaço dos seus pais, casado e pai de 2 filhos menores de idade. O mais velho frequentando a escola e o outro sem idade escolar. 
Com o presente financiamento de 15.000 irá comprar cimento, barrotes e janelas para iniciar com a obra de construção da sua casa no seu próprio espaço. 
Tem como sonhos construir uma casa grande e mobiliar e crescer no seu local de trabalho.
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao trabalho e ao crédito para a solução dos seus pendentes.
texts.en:
Lino is 34 years old. He comes from the district of Magude and lives there. He has his own house but it's built on land that belongs to his parents. He's married and has two underage children. His eldest child is in school and the other child is below school age.
With the current loan for 15,000mts he'll purchase cement, beams and windows so that he can start building his house on his own land.
Lino's dream is to build a large house and furnish it. He also dreams of making career progress.
He struggles with the lack of funds, but he's been turning to his work and credit as a way to settle his affairs.

loans.use: to purchase cement, beams and windows so he can start building his house.

loans.name: Fagamoomooga

texts.en: Fagamoomooga is a 37-year-old lady who operates a small business providing transportation services to people to earn a living. Fagamoomooga requested a loan to buy a seat cover, paint, new windows, new wheels and air conditioning to help her maintain a good service. She hopes to use her profit to buy another taxi and provide for her family's needs. She joined SPBD in 2010.

loans.use: to buy a seat cover, paint, new windows, new wheels and air conditioning.

loans.name: Lisete

texts.pt:
Lisete de 60 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude e residente no mesmo distrito na casa própria, viúva e mãe de 8 filhos todos maiores de idade e independentes excepto os 2 mais novos, um deles  ainda vai a escola. Além dos dois filhos tem na sua responsabilidade 2 netos que vive com eles.
Com o presente financiamento de 6.300 irá comprar alguidares e milho para revender.
Tem como sonhos ver seu negócio a crescer para sustentar seus netos.
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao negócio e ao crédito para suprir as suas necessidades.
texts.en:
Lisete is 60 years old. She comes from the district of Magude and lives there in a house that she owns. She's a widow and has eight children. All her children are independent adults except for the two younger children, one of whom is still in school. Aside from two of her children she's also responsible for two grandchildren who live with her.
With the current loan for 6,300mts she'll purchase bowls and corn for re-selling.
Lisete's dream is to see her business grow so that she can support her grandchildren.
She struggles with the lack of funds, but she's been turning to her business and credit in order to get her needs met.

loans.use: to purchase bowls and corn for re-selling.

loans.name: Ma. Rosario

texts.en: Ma. Rosario is a farmer from Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 46 years old, married and has expertise in farming. She runs a vegetable farm and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Ma. Rosario is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to purchase additional bags of fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers for her vegetable-growing business.

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.en: Hilaria is 68 years old. She is known in the Dipolog City area for her sari-sari store. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the co-op offers. She hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house, for which she applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. She hopes to maintain her membership in good-standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that she has been given priority, as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what she is thankful for, when all her financing needs of her retailing business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house.

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen has already repaid his first Kiva loan. Now he hopes that he will manage to have one more loan with Kiva and Nor Horizon and as profitable as his first one. 

Karen lives in Tsakhkunk village of the Gegharkunik region. He lives with his wife, 3 children and his mother. Karen sustains his family needs only through his farming and the sale of his farm products. On his farm he has cows, calves, sheep and lambs and chickens. His land is also rich with vegetables such as tomato, cucumber, carrots, peppers and greens. All his farm products Karen sells with his mother at the city’s wholesale market. 

Karen is very hard working and he works so much just to have more profit. He hopes if he manage to enlarge the number of his farm cattle maybe some of his family’s financial needs will reduce. So with this Kiva loan he wants to buy two cows for his farm and also fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy two cows for his farm and also fodder for his farm cattle

loans.name: Blanca Irma

texts.es:
Blanca, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada, su esposo trabaja prestando servicio militar, es madre de tres hijos, el mayor de sus hijos es profesor de educación física, la segunda tiene 16 años y estudia primer año de bachillerato, la tercera tiene 11 años de edad y estudia quinto grado.

Blanca, se dedica a la venta de pupusas, también vende cuajada molida desde hace 4 años, ella aprendió todo lo que sabe gracias a su madre, porque era comerciante.- La venta de pupusas la tiene en su casa y para vender la cuajada sale a venderla casa a casa y en el negocio le ayuda su esposo, pues él se encarga de comprar la materia prima para las pupusas.

Blanca, necesita el financiamiento para comprar bolsas plásticas, repollos, frijoles, quesillo y maíz, además terminara de pagar la refrigeradora donde guarda los productos perecederos. 

El sueño de Blanca, es que sus dos hijas estudien una carrera universitaria, para que puedan tener un ingreso fijo.
texts.en:
Blanca studied until the 9th grade.  She is married, and her husband serves in the military.  She is the mother of 3 children.  The oldest is a P.E. teacher, the middle child is 16 years old and in the first year of high school, and the youngest is 11 years old and in the 5th grade.  

Blanca makes a living selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas).  She has also sold ground cheese curds for 4 years.  She learned everything she knows from her mother, who was a salesman.  She sells pupusas from her home and goes door to door to sell the cheese curds.  Her husband helps her out with the business by buying the primary ingredients for the pupusas.  

Blanca needs the loan to buy plastic bags, cabbage, beans, cheese, and corn, as well as to finish paying for the refrigerator where she keeps perishable goods.

Blanca's dream is for her two daughters to get university degrees so that they can have a steady income.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags, cabbage, beans, cheese, and corn, as well as to finish paying for the refrigerator where she keeps perishable goods.

loans.name: Sumber Makmur Group

texts.en:
Atab, 46 years old (second from the left, front row), is the leader of Sumber Makmur farmer group. He has a family of three children and lives in a small village at Lampung Tengah, Indonesia.

Atab strives to improve his family’s economic conditions. He has been running a small-scale vegetable farm and has a few cows to fatten and to sell. His business is going quite well. However, he was deeply concerned to see a high price and scarcity of non-renewable cooking gas, high price of chemical fertilizers, and also seeing the cow dung wasted without further processing, while polluting the air with a pungent odor. 

After socializing by Yayasan Rumah Energi (YRE) and Lembaga Pengembangan Pertanian Nahdatul Ulama/LPPNU (a local NGO – biogas construction partner of YRE) about the Household Biogas (BIRU) program, Atab sees that biogas is a good solution for his problems. He sees an opportunity to reduce his dependence on non-renewable cooking gas. In addition, he also wants to use bio-slurry (biogas residue) as organic fertilizer for his plants. He is so keen to purchase a bio-digester, but he does not have sufficient capital for it. A loan from Kiva will help him and the other farmer group members to make it possible. 

Atab has optimism that if he can build a bio-digester, he can use the biogas for cooking, and bio-slurry (biogas residue) as fertilizer for his plantation. He also wants to sell the remaining bio-slurry to increase his family income. He hopes that in the future, he can invite all of the farmers in his village to use biogas.

loans.use: to build bio-digester facilities and utilize the biogas residue as organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy iron sheets to roof their residential  house

loans.name: Monalisa

texts.en:
Monalisa is a 35-year-old mother with six children. She runs a small business selling tuna sandwiches and toasted sandwiches in her community to earn a living. 

Monalisa requested a loan to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, containers and butter to assist with the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, containers and butter.

loans.name: Sefulu

texts.en:
Sefulu is a 32-year-old mother with four children. She owns and operates a business selling elei printing materials at the market to earn a living. 

Sefulu requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brushes, elei designs, containers and a printing machine to assist her in running the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2011.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brushes, elei designs, containers and a printing machine.

loans.name: Zosimo

texts.en: Zosimo is a businessman from Oroquieta. He is 53 years old, married, and has expertise in selling. He runs a sari-sari store (mini grocery) and earns an income that sufficiently supports his family. Zosimo is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has received several loans already. He maintains his membership in good standing without records of default. Now he has applied for a loan to restock his store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Zosimo continues to look for better business opportunities, which is proof that he has the passion and energy to make ends meet for his family.

loans.use: to restock his store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Sos

texts.en:
Sos is 26 years old and he lives with his wife and his parents in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. Sos’ father is in the Russian Federation and working there and sends money for his family. Sos has higher education; he graduated Yerevan State Polytechnic and now works as computer operator. His wife and mother are unemployed. 

Sos asks this loan as his mother is unhealthy and all the family is worried. Sos is sure that there is nothing serious but he wants to take his mother to the doctor for medical examination. Sos is thankful beforehand for Kiva loan by the help of which his mother’s health problem can be solved.

loans.use: for medical examination of his mother in order to solve her health problem

loans.name: Jose Ri

texts.en: Jose Ri is 45 years old and lives in Gampis, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. He is married and has children who are in school. Jose Ri owns and operates a business providing transport to local community members for a living. He has been doing this for 15 years. He has requested a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase spare parts for motorcycle repair. Jose Ri is a member in good standing of PMPC. In the future, Jose Ri hopes to save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for motorcycle repair for his transportation business

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
This charming woman is 43 years old and she lives with her two beautiful daughters in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. Hasmik’s husband is in the Russian Federation and he does different constructional work there and transfers money for his family needs. 

Hasmik started in 2007 her small trading business at the wholesale market of the city. Here she rents a stall and she sells a great assortment of children, women and men clothes, shoes, accessories and also very stylish assortment of curtains. She mentions that she has a lot of regular customers who have coming to her stall for 8 years and who help her to keep her business. 

Now with this loan Hasmik wants to renew her stall’s assortment in order to make it more fashionable and attractive for new customers.

loans.use: to renew her stall’s assortment in order to make it more fashionable and attractive for new customers

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.en:
Feliciana is from the village of Gampis, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 58 years old and married. Feliciana owns and operates a sari-sari store (convenience store), selling basic commodities in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over 30 years and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month. 

In 2007, Feliciana joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan from PMPC. Feliciana is requesting a new loan of 50,000 PHP which will be used to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. This loan will be her 12th loan from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a businessman who earns through retailing various items. He is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance. Recently, he applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and galvanized iron sheets for house completion.

loans.use: to purchase additional bags of cement and galvanized iron sheets for completion of her house.

loans.name: Augustine

texts.en:
Augustine is an old client of the institution and he is married with 7 children, having five attending school. Augustine deals in goats as his major source of income.  He has had this business for over 13 years and has been taking loans from Ugafode, which have enabled him to sustain his business and meet all his family financial needs. 

He has applied for a loan of ugx2,500,000 to boost his business and continued financing of all his family financial needs, especially taking his children to school. Augustine thanks Ugafode for assistance it has given to him which has improved his standards of living.

loans.use: To boost his animal sales by buying more goats for raising and sale

loans.name: Kanoel

texts.en:
Kanoel is a new client to the branch. She is married with 3 children having 2 attending school. She works with an NGO which she has worked for 6 months. She operates a crafts shop which she has operated for over 4 years.  However she has been hindered by limited capital to expand her business. 

Kanoel decided to join Ugafode for financial assistance and she applied for a loan of ugx3,000,000 to add capital in her business and increase on sales. Kanoel hopes to increase on the profitability of her business since her capital has will have increased by the loan she got from Ugafode. Kanoel thanks Ugafode for financial assistance which enables people with limited capital to expand their businesses.

loans.use: To boost her crafts business by buying stock of crafts for sale

loans.name: Zachary

texts.en:
Sustainable Infrastructure Corp. DBA Millennial Construction (“SIC”) will provide solar renewable energy services to residential/commercial/government customers. SIC will also provide industrial construction services including construction management, mechanical construction, alternative energy construction, process system installations, ESP system installations, structural steel installation, and fabrication services. Zachary (President) has spent over nine years of his career establishing this organization. It will not only be great for him but will also help create additional jobs and provide sustainability and alternative energy for society. 

Zachary holds a Bachelor of Science degree in construction management from ITT Technical. He started his business in his garage by himself. A key moment that made him start his business was when he got his bachelor's degree and realized that he had all the tools to succeed. He loves his job because he gets to work with his hands and provide renewable energy for the planet. Major start-up challenges for his company are time and money. He will use this Kiva loan to help his company with working capital and to purchase additional business equipment. He wants his company to be the most successful and ethical company known to society.

loans.use: to purchase business equipment and provides working capital

loans.name: Malaeulu

texts.en: Malaeulu is a 38-year-old mother with nine children. She runs a business selling taro and banana in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than three years. Malaeulu requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedling), banana tube (seedling), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, backpack sprayer and hand gloves to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business and provide for her family's needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2010.

loans.use: to buy taro roots (seedling), banana tube (seedling), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, backpack sprayer and hand gloves

loans.name: Lesina

texts.en: Lesina is 37 years old and has four children. She operates a business selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. Lesina requested a loan to buy banana tube (seedling), taro roots (seedling), a wheelbarrow, backpack sprayer, hand gloves, rake, shovel, and chemicals to assist her in running the business. She joined SPBD in 2011, and hopes to use her profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy banana tube (seedling), taro roots (seedling), a wheelbarrow, backpack sprayer, hand gloves, rake, shovel, and chemicals

loans.name: Fialupe

texts.en: Fialupe is a 30-year-old mother with six children. She runs and operates a small convenience store in her village to earn a living. Fialupe requested a loan to buy a box of chicken, sack of flour, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, and plastic bags to assist her in running the business. She became a member of SPBD in 2012, and she will expand her business using her profit.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, sack of flour, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, and plastic bags

loans.name: Limalau

texts.en: Limalau is a 52-year-old mother with four children. She runs a small business selling tuna sandwiches and toast sandwiches in her community to earn a living. Limalau requested a loan to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, a container, and butter to assist with the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, a container, and butter

loans.name: Louisa

texts.en: Louisa is a 29-year-old mother with three children. She runs a business selling tuna sandwiches and toast sandwiches in her community to earn a living. Louisa requested a loan to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, container, and butter to assist with the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, container, and butter

loans.name: Baghdasar

texts.en:
Baghdasar is 62 years old and he lives with his wife in Vanadzor city of Lori region. Baghdasar has a son who is already married and he lives with his family. This man has higher pedagogical education and now at the school he works as deputy of director. Baghdasar is a very disciplined, intelligent and responsible person and is very much respected person. 

Baghdasar asks loan of 500.000 Armenian drams as he wants to buy a computer so that he can use it at his house.  That way he will have always have the chance to be aware of any innovation or any changes in teaching methodologies in the educational system.

loans.use: to buy a computer so that he can use it at his house

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 43 years old, married, has four children and lives at Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Norte. She thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group of Paglaum MPC. She decided to give it a try after she learned she can request financial assistance for her chosen business. Vilma has maintained her membership in good standing without records of default up to this day. She has received several loans and all were paid in a timely manner. 

Recently she requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase bags of fertilizers, pesticides and labor cost payments. Vilma wishes to continuously manage her business more effectively with the support of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers, pesticides and labor cost payments

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a new client to the institution. He is married with two children having one attending school and two dependents. He operates a retail shop in farmers Rukungiri municipality, which he has done  for15 years, however he is faced with limited capital limited capital to expand his business. 

To overcome this challenge, Ibrahim decided to join Ugafode for financial assistance to supplement his capital. He applied for a loan of ugx3,000,000 to add stock to his business i.e. he wants to buy sugar, rice.posho, saucepans, and other retail goods.  Ibrahim hopes using the loan will enable him expand his business and he has a dream of making a wholesale business.

loans.use: To boost his retail stock of sugar, rice, posho and other daily household use items

loans.name: Emele

texts.en: Emele is a 50-year-old mother with three children. She owns and operates a small business selling elei printing materials at the market to earn a living. Emele requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, elei design, containers, and a printing machine, to assist her in running the business. She has been doing this for more than two years. She will use her profit to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, elei design, containers, and a printing machine,

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo,  posee un tienda desde hace 3 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de las ventas que realiza es como ha podido salir adelante, la joven es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, huevos, leche y además mobiliario para colocar la mercadería y así surtir su negocio para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
This young woman's face has been blurred because she is 28 years old and lives in a high-risk area.  She has had a store for 3 years and her business is located in her home.  She has a lot of customers, and she uses her profits from sales to get ahead.  She is a single mother and lives in her own home with her daughter.  

She is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, eggs, meat, and furniture for displaying merchandise, so that she can stock her business in order to bring in better earnings.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, meat, and furniture for displaying merchandise.

loans.name: Talainuu

texts.en: Talainuu is 44 years old and has three children. She operates a business selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. Talainuu requested a loan to buy banana tube (seedling), taro roots (seedling), a wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, and chemicals to assist her in running the business. She joined SPBD in 2006, and hopes to expand her business using her profit.

loans.use: to buy banana tube (seedling), taro roots (seedling), a wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, and chemicals

loans.name: Olga

texts.pt:
Olga de 25 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude e é residente no mesmo distrito e na casa própria, casada, mãe de 3 filhos menores de idade, um dos quais frequentando o ensino primário.
Com o presente financiamento de 12.000 irá comprar feijão, amendoim, farinha e batata para iniciar um negócio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade.
Tem como sonhos construir a sua casa e ver seu negócio a crescer. 
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao negócio e ao crédito para suprir suas necessidades.
texts.en:
Olga is 25 years old. She comes from the district of Magude and lives there in a house that she owns. She's married and has three underage children, one of whom is is primary school.
With the current loan for 12,000mts she'll purchase beans, peanuts, flour and potatoes so that she can start a business selling products that are household staples.
Olga's dream is to build her house and see her business grow.
She struggles with the lack of funds, but she's been turning to her business and credit as a way to get her needs met.

loans.use: to purchase beans, peanuts, flour and potatoes so she can start a business selling household staples.

loans.name: David Gerardo

texts.es: David Gerardo, tiene la edad  de 28 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y sus hermanos,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
David Gerardo is 28 years old and single.  He lives with his parents and brothers, who are his main priority.  He wants to use his loan to buy good quality bean seeds so that they will germinate well, to buy organic fertilizer that will help to improve the soil conditions and other products to apply during planting, to pay for labor to prepare the land and help make sure that the rain won't cause erosion damage, and to apply products and assist with planting once the seeds have developed.  These investments will allow him to make sure that his work goes well.  

He intends to take advantage of the good climactic and soil conditions found in this area for this crop, and also to put into practice several years of  experience growing for basic grains.  He will be able to buy better quality products so that his crop can develop into a healthy harvest, providing him with an important source of income in the short-term.  

The income from the harvest that he hopes to obtain will go towards the well-being and education of his family and completing some family goals, as well as continued investment in his crops.  This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He had not taken out any loans from national banks before, but FUDECOSUR has provided him the loan at much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to plant beans

loans.name: Las Estrellitas De La Zona A Group

texts.es: Giovanna de 32 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 04 hijos 02 de ellos aun dependientes. Ella Pertenece a la Alcancía Comunal “las Estrellitas de la zona A”  la cual lo conforman 05 socias con deseos de  trabajar honradamente y progresar. Ella hace más de 01 año que se dedica al negocio de venta de ceviche (comida típica del Perú). Gracias a su constante dedicación ella puede ayudar con los gastos del hogar.  Su mayor deseo es poder ampliar su negocio. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de pescado cebolla y camote. La Alcancía “las Estrellitas de la zona A” agradece a los Inversionistas de Kiva por el apoyo brindado. Giovanna es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste casaca de color negro.
texts.en:
Giovanna is 32 years old. She lives with her partner and has 4 children, 2 of which are still dependent. She belongs to the communal bank “Las Estrellitas de la Zona A” [Zone A Stars], which is made up of 5 members with hopes of working honestly and improving. For more than 1 year she has been working in the sale of ceviche (a traditional Peruvian food). Thanks to her persevering dedication, she is able to help with the household expenses. 

Her greatest wish is to be able to expand her business. She is asking for a loan to buy fish, onion and sweet potato. The communal bank “Las Estrellitas de la zona A” is grateful to Kiva investors for the support they have given. Giovanna is the first on the left, wearing a black jacket.

loans.use: to buy fish, onion and sweet potato.

loans.name: Angela Marcela

texts.es: Angela Marcela, tiene la edad  de 27 años, está soltera, vive con sus padres y sus hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno a sembrar y para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Angela Marcela is 27 years old and single. She lives with her parents and brothers, who are her main priority. She wants to use her loan to buy good quality bean seeds so that they will germinate well, to buy fertilizer that will help to improve the soil conditions and other products to apply during planting, and to pay for labor to prepare the land, apply products, and assist with planting once the seeds have developed. These investments will allow her to make sure that her work goes well.

She intends to take advantage of the good climactic and soil conditions found in this area for this crop, and also to put into practice several years of experience growing basic grains. She will be able to buy better quality products so that her crop can develop into a healthy harvest, providing her with an important source of income in the short-term.  The income from the harvest that she hopes to obtain will go towards the well-being and education of her family and completing some family goals, as well as continued investment in her crops. This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She had not taken out any loans from national banks before, but FUDECOSUR has provided her the loan at much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to plant beans

loans.name: Rhina Maria Mela

texts.es: Rhina de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, maíz y demás ingredientes y asi poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Rhina is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children. For 10 years she has made a living making and selling pupusas [a thick stuffed, corn tortilla). Her business is located near her home in a very high traffic area. She manages to pay some household expenses with the money she makes from her sales. 

She is asking for a loan to buy pork rinds, cheese, beans, corn and other ingredients so that she can continue working to generate good income.

loans.use: to buy pork rinds, cheese, beans, corn and other ingredients.

loans.name: Norma Alicia

texts.es: Doña Norma de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee un tienda desde hace 15 años ubicada en su lugar de residencias, gracias a las ventas que realiza es como puede salir adelante con su familia, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de huevos, granos básicos, leche, aceite, pan dulce etc. todo por mayor para surtir su negocio y asi poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Norma is 60 years old and lives in her own home with her extended family.  She has owned a store for 15 years that is located in her home.  She has been able to get ahead with her family thanks to her sales activities.  

She is applying for a loan to buy eggs, basic grains, milk, oil, and sweet bread, all wholesale, to supply her business and therefore generate more income.

loans.use: to buy eggs, basic grains, milk, oil, and sweet bread, all wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more eggs and tools to increase the amount of chickens to sell

loans.name: Zuhair

texts.en:
Zuhair is a father who is working hard to do anything to provide a comfortable life for his children and to secure all their needs. He is 41 years old and lives in Tafileh. He has five children, which means he is responsible for a large family. 

Day after day, the needs of Zuhair's family have increased, and his salary cannot cover all their needs. He decided to start his own business to get more income. He opened a repair shop for electrical tools.

Now he is thinking of expanding his work because of the high standards of living. He is applying for a loan to help him develop and expand his work. He will use the loan to buy more machines and tools to improve the quality of his work.

He said that ”this loan will help me to raise my incomes then I will become able to provide a good educate and life to my kids; I am really need your support.”

loans.use: to develop and expand his work. He will use the loan to buy more machines and tools to improve the quality of his work.

loans.name: Maria Celina

texts.es:
María, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está casada, tiene 5 hijos de 3 a 21 años, 2 de ellos estudian y los otros trabajan para ayudarles.

María, cultiva granos básicos y hace tamales pisques y de gallina para vender en su comunidad, antes se dedicaba a hacer macetas artesanales y las vendía en la plaza, mientras que su esposo trabaja la agricultura, cultivando granos básicos para el consumo del hogar.

María, necesita el dinero para comprar abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para sus cultivos. 

María, es poder mejorar su negocio y darle mejor oportunidad de estudio a sus hijos para que puedan tener una profesión.
texts.en:
María is 37 years old and studied up until second grade. She is married and has five children between the ages of three and 21 years old, two of whom are in school, and the others work to help out their parents. 

María grows basic grains and makes bean and chicken tamales to sell in her community. Before, she made artisanal flowerpots and sold them in the central square, while her husband worked in agriculture, growing basic grains for consumption in their home.  

María needs the loan in order to purchase fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides for her crops. María hopes to improve her business and provide a better opportunity to her children for them study, so that they can have a profession.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides for her crops.

loans.name: Las Mejores Amigas Group

texts.es:
Tomasa (la primera del lado derecho en la fotografía) es una mujer de 46 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de siete hijos de las edades entre 17 y 29 años, ellos viven en una comunidad de Chichicastenango, para Tomasa su familia es muy importante y para que no les haga falta nada se dedica a la elaboración de fajas típicas, ella tiene 3 años de ejercer esta humilde labor, y su esposo es albañil por lo que los dos juntos han sacado adelante a su familia, pero ellos ahora se ven a la necesidad de remodelar la casa, pues ya se encuentra en muy mal estado, aunque una de las dificultades que ellos tienen es no contar con el dinero suficiente para la compra de materiales, pero Tomasa con el afán de hacer posible esta necesidad, ha organizado a un grupo de señoras para juntas adquirir un crédito y comprar materiales como cemento, cal y arena.
El gran anhelo de Tomasa es poder  remodelar su casa para que sus hijos vivan en una casa digna.
texts.en: Tomasa (the first one on the right side of the photograph) is a 48 year old woman. She is married and has a beautiful family of seven children between the ages of 17 and 29. They live in the community of Chichicastenango. For Tomasa her family is very important. In order for them to have everything, she works making native woven belts. She has worked in this humble job for 3 years, and her husband is a mason. Together they have been able to support their family, but now they find themselves in the need of remodeling the house, because it is already in bad condition. However, one of their problems is not having enough money to buy materials; but Tomasa, in order to overcome this obstacle, has organized a group of women so they can obtain a loan together and buy materials such as cement, lime and sand. Tomasa's greatest desire is to be able to remodel her house so that her children may live in a decent house.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, lime and sand.

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is a woman with great ideas and a creative mind. She is very ambitious and has willpower that led her to be a productive woman in her community.  She is always looking for activities that can improve the family's income. She bought a sewing machine and trained on it until she became a professional. She started to make clothes and some products and sell them. That helped her to cover some of the household expenses.

She is 38 years old and lives with her parents in Tafileh. She is single, and she also has a small nursery beside her home to increase her income. Suzan is requesting financial help to buy more fabric and yarn. She can invest in setting up her business and attracting clients, and in this way create a positive impact on her earnings. Her dream is to have a big tailoring business that provides a good income and creates jobs for the women who need jobs to help their families.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and yarn. She can invest in setting up her business and attracting clients

loans.name: Rogerio

texts.pt:
Rogério de 38 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude e é residente de Magude na casa própria, casado e pai de 3 filhos, um dos quais maior de idade e o mais novo frequentando a escola primária.
Com o presente financiamento de 15.000 irá comprar farinha, arroz, óleo, sabão e açucar para dar inicio ao seu negócio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade.
Tem como sonho ver o seu negócio a crescer.
Tem como dificuldades a insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao negócio, trabalho e ao crédito para a suprir as suas necessidades.
texts.en:
Rogério is 38 years old. He comes from the district of Magude and lives there in a house that he owns. He's married and has three children, one of whom is an adult and the youngest child is in primary school.
With the current loan for 15,000mts he'll purchase flour, rice, cooking oil, soap and sugar so he can start a business selling produts that are household staples.
Rogério's dream is to see his business grow.
He struggles with the lack of funds, but he's been turning to business, work and credit in order to get his needs met.

loans.use: to purchase flour, rice, cooking oil, soap and sugar so he can start a business selling household staples.

loans.name: Santos

texts.pt:
Santos de 30 anos de idade, nasceu no distrito de Magude e é residente no mesmo distrito na casa propria, casado, pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a escola e outro sem idade escolar.Tem como base do sustento da sua familia as rendas do seu salão de cabeleireiro.
Com o presente financiamento de 15.000 irá comprar cimento, barrotes, areia, ferros, arrames e pregos para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Tem como sonhos desenvolver crescer no mundo de negócio. Suas dificuldades residem na insuficiência de fundos, mas tem recorrido ao negócio e ao crédito para a solução dos seus pendentes.
texts.en:
Santos is 30 years old. He comes from the district of Magude and lives there in a house that he owns. He's married and has four children, three of whom are in school and the other child is below school age. He supports his family with the profit he makes from his hair salon.
With the current loan for 15,000mts he'll purchase cement, beams, sand, iron, wire and nails so he can continue his construction work.
Santos's dream is to make progress and grow in the business world. He struggles with the lack of funds, but he's been turning to his business and credit as a way to settle his affairs.

loans.use: to purchase cement, beams, sand, iron, wire and nails so he can continue the construction work.

loans.name: Ma. Elsie

texts.en:
Ma. Elsie is 41 years old, a widow with four children of school age and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Norte. She decided to stand on her own when hes husband passed away. She makes a living through her farming and retailing of basic basic commodities business. She runs a rice field and a sari-sari store in Pagadian City and earns a promising income to support her family. 

She has signed up her membership with PMPC to gain access of capitalization. She wants to increase her harvest this cropping season. Now, she has taken a loan to purchase bags of fertilizers and pay for labor cost on her farming activity. Ma. Elsie hopes to sustain her business and dreams to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers and pay for labor cost on her farming activity

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is an old client in the institution who is applying for a loan of shs 3,000,000.  She is aged 43 years, married with 4 children. She hails from kibinzi-ndonero-southern division, Rukungiri district. She does salon business which she says is doing well.

Her main challenge has been limited working capital to buy more salon items like cosmetics. She hopes this loan will assist her to buy more of those inputs and be able to make more income to sustain herself and her family. 

She thanks UGAFODE for the financial support and looks for the same support in future.

loans.use: To boost her beauty salon business by buying hair oils and other beauty products

loans.name: Shushan

texts.en:
Shushan is 44 years old and she lives in Lchashen village of Gegharkunik region. She is married and she lives with her husband. Their son now is in the Russian Federation doing different constructional jobs and he greatly supports his family with finances from there. Their daughter is already married and she lives with her family. 

Shushan used to work as a baker at the bread factory but now she is fully engaged in farming. On her farm she has a cow, calves and chickens.  She sells her farm’s milk, macun (national dairy-product) and eggs right from her house mainly to her neighbors and friends. Shushan also is good in land cultivation and her land’s potatoes are very tasty and she sells them right from her farm. 

So in order to develop and keep her potato cultivation, with this loan she wants to buy potato seedlings and also some fodder for the cattle mini farm.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and also some fodder for the cattle mini farm

loans.name: María Esperanza

texts.es:
María, de 52 años de edad, se dedica al oficio de sastre ya que ella solo estudio sexto grado, junto a su esposo procrearon dos hijas lo cual ya son mayores de edad y está acompañada, por lo cual María, sigue trabajando para comprar lo necesario que se necesita en el hogar ya que también tiene 8 años que se dedica a la elaboración de tamales para la venta. 

María ya tiene 37 años de edad de dedicarse al oficio de sastre ya que fue el oficio que su mama le enseño a muy temprana edad, por lo cual es de donde ella ha podido generar su ingresos para pasar la vida.

El crédito será utilizado en la compra de un máquina para seguir en el oficio de sastre puesto que la máquina que tiene ya dio su vida útil  y necesita de una maquina nueva para ejercer bien su oficio. 

María sueña con seguir trabajando durante para sacar a sus hijos para así darles una vida digna.
texts.en:
Maria, who is 52 years old, is dedicated to tailoring, since she only studied until sixth grade. She and her husband have two daughters, who are older and in relationships. Therefore, Maria continues working to buy the things she needs in her home. She has also been making tamales to sell for 8 years.

Maria has spent 37 years doing tailoring, since it was the job that her mother taught her from a young age. This is how she has been able to earn an income to making a living. 

The loan will be used to buy a machine to continue with dressmaking. The machine she currently owns was useful for a long while, and she needs a new machine to do her job well.

Maria dreams of continuing to work to provide for her children and give them a dignified life.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Mother of one, Shelia was inspired to start her business when her friend told her about a mission-based product line called Younique. Younique is a beauty-product line created in 2012 with a mission to uplift, empower and validate women across the globe.

Sheila has been selling the Younique product line for about seven months and is looking for funds to purchase additional inventory to sell at the county fair.

Shelia loves being able to earn extra income for her family as well as make women feel beautiful.

“I love to be able to set an example for my son by being a business owner,” says Shelia. “Being a small business owner is very rewarding and I hope to expand one day.”

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory to sell at the fair

loans.name: Patricia Esperanza

texts.es:
Patricia, de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a vender CDs de música y películas, juntos tienen 1 hijo.

Patricia, se dedica a vender tortillas, su madre le ayuda y decidió iniciar con este negocio debido a la situación económica; pero además de eso tienen una pequeña tienda de productos básicos, siempre con el objetivo de obtener más ingresos y que su hijo crezca en mejores condiciones de vida.
 
El préstamo lo necesita para surtir su tienda con productos como frijoles, maíz, pan, jabón, detergente, sopas y otros productos, de esa manera lograra que ella y su familia vivan en mejores condiciones de vida.

El sueño de Patricia es, que sus ventas mejoren y tener más clientes.
texts.en:
Patricia, who is 21 years old, studied through high school. She is in a relationship, and her partner sells music CDs and DVDs. Together, they have one son.

Patricia is dedicated to selling tortillas. Her mother helps her, and she decided to start this buying because of her financial situation. In addition, she has a small store selling basic needs. She does all of this with the goal of earning more income and seeing her son grow up with a better quality of life.

She needs the loan to supply her store with products, such as beans, corn, bread, soap, detergent, soups, and other products. In this way, she and her family will be able to live in better conditions.

Patricia’s dream is that her sales improve and that she has more clients.

loans.use: to supply her store with products, such as beans, corn, bread, soap, detergent, soups, and other products.

loans.name: Los Angeles Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LOS ANGELES” iniciará el décimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Sonia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de artículos para el hogar, venta de comida, venta de medias, confección y venta de trajes para damas, venta de abarrotes, venta de coca, venta de papa
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Sonia es integrante, ella indica que hace nueve años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su mamá que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de artículos para el hogar; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio con el primer préstamo que saco dentro en su asociación comunal hace nueve años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cortinas, lámparas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que los créditos, la capacitación y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Los Angeles (The Angels) loan group will start its tenth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal de Collpani. The group includes eight members and is directed by a board of directors, where Mrs. Sonia is the president. The business that the members of the group take forward are varied. Among them are businesses selling household products, selling food, selling socks, dressmaking and selling outfits for women, selling groceries, selling cocoa, and selling potatoes.

The loan will help micro-entrepreneurs in the group in which Sonia is a member. She says that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for nine years. She joined based on an invitation from her mother, who is a client of the institution. At present, she has a business selling household products. She started this business with the first loan that she took out from the loan group nine years ago.

The loan that she will now take is to increase capital to buy curtains and lamps wholesale. She will acquire the items from wholesale sellers in the city of La Paz, and then she will sell the goods in her store. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family financially. This is important because she is single and has two children.

When she asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the loan, the training, and the health center the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy curtains and lamps wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Elva

texts.es:
Maria tiene 42 años de edad, vive en casa familiar de material rústico con sus padres y sus dos menores hijos, vive en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica al alquiler de video juegos en su propio domicilio, cuenta con consolas de play station las que alquila a sus clientes, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será para realizar arreglos y mantenimiento en sus consolas de videojuegos así como para la compra de una mayor cantidad de video juegos ya que desea brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old and lives in the family home built of local materials, along with her parents and her 2 younger children. She lives in the rural part of Pucará district, a community where people engage in agriculture and livestock raising, which is located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in Peru's northern highlands.

She rents video games from her own home and has PlayStation consoles that she rents to her customers. She has experience in this business, as well as good personal and work references in her district. The loan will be to do repairs and maintenance on her video game consoles as well as to purchase a greater quantity of video games, as she wishes to provide better service to customers, which will generate greater income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To do repairs and maintenance on her video game consoles.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es: Mirian, tiene 26 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene  una hija, y reside con ella en  una aldea del municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara.  Mirian es muy trabajadora, tiene su propia finca de café por 2 y media de manzana cultivado y siembra sus propios viveros. La cosecha  la vende en pergamino, húmedo y seco en la zona donde vive. Con esta actividad mantiene a su hija. Ha decidido solicitar un prestamo por 20,000 lempiras para mantenimiento de su finca y siembra de vivero, va comprar fertilizantes, abonos, y pago de  limpieza de la finca. Con esta inversión va mejorar su cosecha. Su plan es incrementar la producción y seguir trabajando dia a dia para salir adelante con su hija.
texts.en:
Mirian is 26 years old. She is a single mother. She has a daughter and lives with her in a village in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. 

Mirian is very hard-working. She has her own coffee farm where she cultivates two and a half manzanas (about four acres), and she raises her own nursery plants. She sells her harvest in parchment, moist, and dried in the zone where she lives. With this business, she supports her daughter. 

She has decided to apply for a loan of 20,000 lempiras to maintain her farm and plant her coffee seedlings. She is going to buy fertilizers and compost and pay to clean the farm. With this investment, she is going to improve her harvest. Her plan is to increase production and continue working day after day in order to advance, along with her daughter.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost and pay for cleaning to maintain her farm and plant coffee seedlings

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en:
Walaa is 19 years old. She is a young married woman without children, and lives in one of the poor areas in Jordan. She is a conservative woman and asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

After she felt that her husband was facing financial problems and could not cover all the household expenses, she decided to help him and they started thinking of opening their own business. Now Walaa and her husband have a small kiosk to sell coffee and hot drinks in addition to snacks.

She has been involved in this business for a few months and the business is working well, but she is thinking of developing it and increasing her customers. Therefore, she requested a loan to do good promotions, to buy food supplies to sell and to add more kinds of coffee to sell. Her plan is to open a shop, and she hopes that in the future, she will have a better life with the one she chose.

loans.use: to do good promotions, to buy food supplies to sell and to add more kinds of coffee to sell.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad needs support to achieve his dreams. He is a simple guy who lives with his family in West Irbid and he is 24 years old.

Mohammad is studying at the University, majoring in accounting. He chose this major because he dreams of working in one of the banks or in one of the big accounting firms.

The current goal that he has is to graduate from college and start a new life, but the financial problems that are faced by his family are obstacles standing in front of him. So he decided to apply for an education loan to be able to cover his university fees and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees

loans.name: Dienaba Gouro's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois  a été créé le 12 Juillet2008  lors l’inauguration du dit banc villageois. Ce groupement compte des femmes qui habitent toutes la même zone. Elles jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Dienaba Gouro (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est âgée 31 ans, mariée et mère de 03 filles. Elle est restauratrice.

Avec ce nouveau crédit elle compte acheter 01 sac de sucre à 25000f, des haricots d’une valeur de 25000, du café à 35000 et 03 tablettes d’œufs à 9000f pour les besoins de son restaurant ceci tout les 2 semaines.
