She needs the loan to buy a snack stand that a friend is selling to her, as she no longer wants it because she needs the money she invested building the snack stand and its appliances. 

Rosa dreams that her children will succeed and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a snack stand.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Doña Maribel de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y también a la pesca artesanal desde hace 24 años, gracias a su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Maribel is 50 years old. She llives in her own home with her family group. She has sold tortillas and also worked in artisanal fishing for 24 years. Thanks to her work, she has been able to get ahead with the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy quintals of corn and lime to continue making the tortillas and thus be able to obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy quintals of corn and lime.

loans.name: María Eduviges

texts.es:
María, de 41 años de edad,  vive  junto a su compañero de vida, sus 2 hijos y su madre, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, saco sus estudios de bachillerato, sus hijos se encuentran estudiando. 
 
María,  tiene un negocio de bisutería y varios artículos de arreglos florales, negocio en el cual tiene más de 20 años, decidió aprender la elaboración de flores y otros artículos en unos cursos que estaban impartiendo cerca de su comunidad, desde entonces decidió emprender su propio negocio, el cual día con día va creciendo, al negocio viaja todos los días alrededor de 20 minutos y que le queda aproximadamente a 6 kilómetros de distancia de su casa.

El crédito será utilizado en la compra de unas vitrinas para exhibir productos a sus clientes, ya que las vitrinas se las venden en oferta.

El sueño de María, es que sus hijos se preparen académicamente para que tengan un mejor futuro, que su negocio siga en crecimiento y abrir otro local.
texts.en:
María is 41 years old. She lives with her life's companion, their two children and her mother. She is a very hardworking woman. She graduated from high school and her children are in school.  
 
María has a business that sells jewelry and various floral arrangements. She has had the business for more than 20 years. She decided to learn how to do the flowers and other items in some courses they were offering close to her community. Since then, she decided to open her own business, which is growing now. She travels around 20 minutes a day to her business and it is about 6 kilometers from her house. 

The loan will be used to buy some display cases to display products to her customers, because they display cases are on sale. 

María's dream is for her children to be educated so that they can have a better future, for her business to continue growing, and to open another locale.

loans.use: to buy display cases to show her products.

loans.name: Martha De Jesus

texts.es: Martha de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda y también una venta de tortillas y pupusas desde hace 6 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas puede salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de productos para su tienda (azúcar, golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, etc.) también maíz y cal  para la elaboración de los alimentos y poder tener mejores ingresos económicos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Martha is 40 years old. She lives in her own home with her family group. She has owned a store and also a tortilla and pupusa business for 6 years. Her business is located in her residence and she has a lot of customers. With what she obtains from her sales she is able to get ahead. She is asking for a loan to buy products for her store (sugar, snacks, beverages, basic grains, etc.) as well as corn and line to make the food, in order to have better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar, snacks, beverages, basic grains, etc. as well as corn and lime.

loans.name: Iteka Group

texts.fr:
Aloys  fait partie   du groupe Iteka. Il a 47 ans et est marie à Estella  une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont  5  enfants  âgés de  8 à 18 ans, dont  étudient.

Il  fait le commerce   de bananes et de la bière industrielle Primus  depuis  8 ans. 

Il est à son huitième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande de  bananes et de bière Primus  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Aloys, age 47, is a member of the Iteka group. He is married to a merchant named Estella, and they have five children ages 8 to 18 years old who all go to school. 

Aloys has been selling bananas and Primus industrial beer for eight years. This is his 8th loan cycle with Turame to bolster his capital. He plans to purchase a large quantity of bananas and Primus beer to sell and increase his revenue. 

In the coming years, he wants to see his children to pursue their studies.

loans.use: to bolster his capital, buy a large quantity of bananas and Primus beer to sell, and increase his revenue.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa vive en casa propia con sus dos nieto, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace varios años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía, para luego vender sus productos agrícolas en los pueblos aledaños, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas, etc. y poder continuar con su trabajo y tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Rosa lives in her own home with her two grandchildren. She has grown corn for several years. When her harvest is ready, she stores it in the granaries shown in the photograph to later sell her agricultural products in the nearby towns. She is asking for a loan to buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, etc., so that she can continue with her work and have more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Teresa Delcarmen

texts.es: Doña Teresa de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica al cultivo de plátanos y ejotes también a la crianza de ganado bovino tiene 30 años de dedicarse a esa actividad agrícola y gracias a ese trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas y la compra de una novilla para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Teresa, 59 years old, lives in her own family home. She earns a living growing bananas and green beans, and also raising cattle. She has been doing agricultural work for thirty years, and this is how she's gotten ahead in life.

Teresa is applying for a loan to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, and to buy a heifer so that she can continue with her work and get better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, and to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Virginia Eloy

texts.es: Doña Virginia de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, su hija y su nieta, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y tamales desde hace 20 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias y con la ayuda de su hija han podido salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor para la elaboración de los alimentos y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Doña Virginia is 62 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, daughter and granddaughter. 

Virginia has been making a living selling tortillas and tamales for the last 20 years. She runs her business from her home and Virginia has many customers. With what she earns from her business, and with her daughter's support, Virginia is able to cover her living costs. 

Virginia is seeking a loan to buy corn wholesale so that she can make her products at a lower cost and in this way increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es: Juana de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 8 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos del hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes pero como no cuenta de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción y pago de mano de obra  y así  tener una vivienda digna para sus hijos.
texts.en: Juana is 40 years old. She is a single mother who lives in her own house with her three children. For 8 years, she has owned a small store located in her house. With what she earns from her sales, she is able to pay for some household expenses. She wants to improve her house by plastering the walls, but because she does not have enough capital, she is requesting a loan to buy building materials and to pay for hand labor; and in this way to have a decent house for her children.

loans.use: to buy building materials and to pay for hand labor.

loans.name: Santhiaba 2 Group

texts.fr: Ce villageois a été inauguré le 23 Mars 2001. Le groupe est composé de huit femmes qui s'activent dans le commerce et qui se soutiennent solidairement. Elles remboursent toujours leurs prêts à temps. Madame Dienaba qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 45 ans et mère de six garçons. Elle s'active dans la vente de tissus teintés et de la patte d'arachide depuis plus de quinze ans. Elle va acheter 25 pièces de tissu et 15 seaux de 20Kg de patte d'arachide. Elle n'est pas seule dans cette mais malgré la concurrence elle parvient à écouler ses marchandises. Les bénéfices vont servir à participer à la prise en charge de sa famille.
texts.en:
This village business group was inaugurated on March 23, 2001. The group is composed of eight women who work in small-scale commerce and show solidarity in supporting each other. They always reimburse their loans on time. 

Madame Dienaba who is on the right in the photo raising her hand is the representative of the group. She is married, aged 45, and the mother of six sons. She has been working at selling dyed cloth and peanut butter for 15 years. She is going to buy 25 lengths of cloth and 15 buckets of peanut butter. She is not the only one in this business, but despite the competition she manages to sell her merchandise. The profits will allow her to participate in supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy dyed cloth and peanut butter

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado desde hace 10 años, vende sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas ganado para continuar con la crianza y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos para tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and child.

 For the last ten years Gloria has been making a living raising and selling livestock. She sells to the surrounding towns and is able to support herself with what she earns. Gloria is seeking a new loan to buy more livestock and hence be able to continue with her business raising livestock. This will allow her to increase her earnings and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more livestock

loans.name: Olita

texts.en:
Olita is a 46-year-old woman, married with four children. To earn a living, she makes and sells "ie lavalava," which are ankle length sarongs. She has been in this line of work for more than two years.

Olita has requested a loan to buy paintbrushes, paints, and other materials to make brightly patterned "lavalava" for her customers. Her profits will help to support her family and grow her business for the future. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy paintbrushes, paints, and other materials to make "lavalava" or sarongs

loans.name: Malia

texts.en:
Malia is 30 years old and married with three children. She runs a small business selling banana chips in her community and has been doing this for three years.

Malia has requested a loan to buy oil, frying pans, bananas, and paper to expand her business. With her earnings, Malia will be better able to support her family financially. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital.

loans.use: to buy oil, frying pans, paper, and bananas for her banana chip business

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es: Magdalena de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas desde hace 20 años su negocio esta ubico en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo han podido salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando piso cerámico pero no tiene suficiente capital para hacerlo por eso está solicitando un crédito para la  compra de materiales de construcción y pago de mano de obra para remodelar su piso y así poder tener un vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 47 years old and she lives in her own home with her husband. She earns a living making tortillas that she sells from her home. She's had this business for twenty years and with this income, plus her husband's help, they get ahead.

Magdalena wants to improve her house by installing ceramic tile floors but does not have the capital, this is why she is applying for the loan. She will buy the construction materials and pay for the labor to remodel the floor and have a decent home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay the labor to install ceramic tile floors.

loans.name: Ambar

texts.es: Ambar se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, vende estos productos desde un terreno que se encuentra al lado de su casa. Solicita un préstamo por $500 para construir un local donde pueda ofrecer con mayor comodidad sus productos, de esta manera podría incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en: Ambar dedicates her time to selling fruits and vegetables, which she sells from a plot of land next to her house.  She is asking for a $500 loan to build a stand to give more convenience to her products, and in this way increase her sales.

loans.use: to build a stand to sell fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: Maria de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de enchape y lociones desde hace 13 años, clienta venden en los mercados, bancos y comerciales que están cerca de su casa y ya tiene clientes fijos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor ya que así podrá obtener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner.  She has made a living selling plated jewelry and lotion for 13 years, selling in markets, banks, and businesses close to her house, and she now house fixed clientele.  She is able to move ahead with what she makes.  

She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise at wholesale prices so that she can have better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy plated jewelry and lotion at wholesale.

loans.name: Xenia Yanira

texts.es:
Xenia, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta 9 grado, vive junto a sus tres hijos, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. 

Xenia posee una pequeña tienda, y también se dedica a la venta de tortillas negocio en el cual tiene más de siete años de tenerlo, decidió dedicarse al negocio cuando su esposo los dejo, y tenía que luchar para sacar a su familia adelante.    

El crédito será utilizado para la reparación de la casa donde tiene el horno para la elaboración del pan ya que estaba bastante deteriorada y unas ráfagas de viento la tiraron el suelo y quedo destruida totalmente.

El sueño de Xenia es que sus hijos logren graduarse de la universidad, y mejorar las condiciones de vida, y quiere que su negocio siga en crecimiento.
texts.en:
Xenia is 33 years old, studied through 9th grade and lives together with her 3 children, who are all studying. 

Xenia has a small store and also sells tortillas, a business she has had for more than 6 years. She decided to start the business when her husband left them and she had to fight to move her family forward.  

The loan will be used to repair the house where the oven used for bread is located, as it was very  deteriorated and a few strong gusts of wind knocked it down, destroying it completely.  

Xenia's dream is that her children will graduate from university, to have better living conditions, and she wants her business to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy the materials to repair her home.

loans.name: Mawar Group

texts.en:
After evaluating the group's previous loan, which was successful, the Mawar Group decided to request another from MUK. They would like to continue to increase their business until they all have enough savings and working capital to run their businesses by themselves.

One group member, Ni Komang, sells piglets in her village and will use her portion of the loan to purchase superior feed and renovate the cages for her pigs. To reduce her costs, she gives her animals feed made from various kinds of leaves, such as banana leaves. She hopes that in the next five months the pigs can grow healthy and earn a satisfactory price. Her profits will be saved for the capital of her business.

At the end of the previous loan period, the Mawar Group successfully paid off their loan on time. During the loan period, they were able to keep their pigs well and away from disease. The pigs were fed with nutritious feed and vitamins. Ni Komang sold her fattened pigs and earned enough profit to send her children to school and meet the daily needs of her family. She’s very happy for the result. Her husband and her family feel the benefits. She sends thanks to Lenders, Kiva, and MUK for supporting her business.

loans.use: to purchase superior feed and renovate cages for pigs

loans.name: Margilyn

texts.en:
Margilyn has been in the farming business for ten years. She and her husband also have a welding and vulcanizing shop as an additional source of income.

Margilyn would like to make her rice field productive and that's the reason why she's asking for additional capital in the amount of PHP 30,000. She will use this loan to buy farm inputs such as seedlings, fertilizer, and insecticides as well as for the payment to rent a hand tractor used on her farmland.

Margilyn hopes to obtain the said amount of loan to keep her farm land productive.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seedlings, fertilizer,  insecticides and payment for the rent of a hand tractor for her farming business.

loans.name: José Felipe

texts.es: Jose Felipe es un joven de 19 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a sus queridos padres en una comunidad de Sololá, para Jose Felipe apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa es fundamental es por ello que se dedica a la herrería desde hace 3 años, gracias a esta labor ha logrado sacar adelante a sus familia, él es un joven emprendedor  y que a pesar de su corta edad ha empezado la construcción de su casa, aunque ahora ya no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para terminar la construcción por tal razón solicita un crédito para poder comprar cemento, hierro, y arena para finalizar la construcción,  Jose Felipe tiene las esperanzas puestas en este crédito para que su sueño se haga realidad que es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jose Felipe is a young man of 19 years, he is single and lives together with his beloved parents in the community of Sololá. In order for Jose Felipe to help his parents with the household expenses, it has been critical for him to make a living at a smithy for the past 3 years. Thanks to this work he has managed to support his family.

He is a young entrepreneur and despite his young age, he has begun the construction of a house. But now he no longer has enough money to finish construction. For this reason he requests a loan in order to be able to buy cement, iron, and sand to finish construction.

Jose Felipe hopes that this loan will make his dream of having his own house a reality.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron and sand.

loans.name: Sari Maju Group

texts.en:
Sari Maju is a group of farmers who own land or rent land from others. In the last period, they borrowed money to buy seeds and fertilizer. Currently they are already harvesting and got the expected results from their previous planting. That's because the results of the plantation are very nice and they have a high selling price. Sari Maju group members are very gratefull for the results that they have and they thank the Lenders, Kiva and MUK.

After paying off the loan, the Sari Maju group reapplied for a loan for the cost of fertilizer, seeds and maintenance cost. This month starts the dry season and they have to change the way to prepare the land and planting crops that are suitable for the dry season, such as peanuts, cassava and other crops. 

Ni Komang is using her  loan to pay for the cost of tillage, fertilizer and buy seeds. She hopes the crops can grow well and she can sell it at a high price. Ni Komang has a dream and hopes to repair her house with the results obtained from the garden.

loans.use: to pay for the cost of tillage, fertilizer and buy seeds of corn and chilies.

loans.name: Oliva

texts.en:
Oliva hails from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is a 43-year-old married woman with five dependents. Her oldest child is 19 and the youngest is 5 years old. For the livelihood of her family, she has been raising hogs for 5 years. Her husband has an income that helps to defray the family's daily expenses.

Oliva has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy additional pigs and piglets. With the presence of these resources, Oliva could increase her profits and improve her family's lifestyle. She could afford to continue to send her children to school and also to provide them with nutritious diets. Additionally, Oliva could settle her current obligations and improve her family's financial standing.

Oliva is hopeful to expand her piggery business, striving to be sustainable and successful. In the years to come, she will have a strong business to support the needs of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs and piglets.

loans.name: Kudrat

texts.en:
Kudrat is a talented woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1992. She is living in a village with her family. She is divorced and has one child. 

She had an activity of planting agricultural products. After participation at a three-day training provided by IMON to startup clients, she decided to do business keeping livestock and selling for an extra price. She got necessary knowledge to open her own business. 

She is requesting a loan from Kiva lenders to buy calves. She awaits Kiva lenders' compassion.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Chamnan

texts.en:
Chamnan is a 25-year-old, single student who is studying as a hotel and tourism major in his fourth year at a university in the city. He is from the Takeo province in Cambodia. His parents are farmers. 

Due to a shortage of financial support, Chamnan is now requesting a loan to pay for his fourth-year tuition fees. This loan will help him graduate and earn important skills to find a good job. In the future, he wants to work for a hotel in the city and to save money to build his own house.

loans.use: to pay for his fourth-year tuition fees

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер тот человек, которым можно гордиться. Он всегда жил ради семьи и всю жизнь посвятил им. Алишер благородный и образованный мужчина. За жизнь которую он имеет, безгранично благодарен своим родителям. Его отец пенсионер и учитель русского языка, а мама тоже пенсионерка, она была доктором. Алишер всегда считал своим идолом своего отца. Его отец вкусно готовил и Алешер в детстве наблюдал за своим отцом и учился готовить как он. В итоге всего, Алишер имеет свою столовую и сам работает поваром. Он считает, что это его призвание в жизни. Алишер с семьей жил хорошо. Но в один день у его брата Джамшеда начались проблемы со здоровьем. Его тазовая кость нуждается в операции. Никто, в том числе и Алишер не бросил его и всей семьей поддерживают  Джамшеда. Сейчас Джамшеду нужны деньги на операцию в размере $12000. Все родственники и друзья собирают деньги на операцию, но еще $5000 не хватает, Алишер принял быстрое решение обратиться за кредитом, потому что операцию необходимо сделать в самые короткие сроки. Алишер надеется, что здесь ему помогут, и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Alisher is an admirable man.  He has always lived for the sake of his family and has devoted his whole life to them.  He is also a righteous and educated man.  He is infinitely grateful to his parents for the life that he has.  His father is retired but still teaches Russian.  His mom is also retired but used to work as a physician.  Alisher's role-model has always been his own father who was an exceptional cook. When he was young, Alisher used to watch him prepare dishes and he now cooks likes his dad.  Alisher now has his own restaurant and works as a cook.  He believes that this is his life's vocation.

Alisher has had a good life among his family, until the day his brother Dzhamshed started to experience health problems.  Dzhamshed now needs a hip surgery.  The whole family is supporting him and no-one is letting him down, especially not Alisher.  Dzhamshed needs about 12,000 USD for his surgery.  His relatives and friends have come together and already gathered some money, but they are still missing 5,000 USD.  For this reason, Alisher has taken the quick decision to apply for a loan, because his brother needs to have surgery as soon as possible.  Alisher hopes to receive some support and he thanks you in advance for your help.

loans.use: to pay for his brother's surgery.

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.en:
Gavhar is a shy girl. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1997. She is single and lives with her parents. She is a talented, responsible and kind person. 

Gavhar studied how to sew traditional women's dresses from tailors. Recently, after participation at a three-day training provided by IMON to startup clients, she decided to open her business. 

In order to start doing business, she needs to buy a sewing machine. She appealed to IMON for a loan to buy a sewing machine. She is willing to be supported and awaits Kiva lenders' compassion.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Fayziniso

texts.en:
Fayziniso is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1977. She is living in a village with her family. She is married and has four children. 

She has a business of making a traditional thick yogurt. She has many years of practice doing business and knows well her duty. She was one of the participants who participated at a three-day training provided by IMON to startup clients. She got necessary information and knowledge to open her own business. 

She is planning to buy a refrigerator and a device to make traditional thick yogurt. She is asking for financial support from Kiva and IMON to buy necessary items, such as a refrigerator and device to make traditional thick yogurt. She hopes to be supported and awaits your compassion.

loans.use: to buy necessary items such as a refrigerator and a device to make traditional thick yogurt

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vinegar and pay for the school fees of her child

loans.name: Paulette Del Carmen

texts.es: Paulette vende artesanías en su comunidad. Con un préstamo de $250 comprará materiales para elaborar más productos, incrementar sus ventas e ingresos, y mejorar así las condiciones de vida personal y familiar.
texts.en: Paulette sells artisan crafts in her community. With a loan of $250, she will buy materials to make more products, increase her sales and income, and thereby improve her personal and family living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to make artisan crafts.

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Davao is said to be the fruit basket of the Philippines. The fertile land and huge forested areas are favorable to fruit-bearing trees as well as vegetable farming. The tropical weather conditions in Davao, or Mindanao region in general, is more stable compared to Visayas region. Typhoons seldom visit the area. 

Amelita, 41, has a stall selling fruits and vegetables in Davao City. She also runs a food house that offers snacks and usual viands. The profits derived from her business helps provide for the basic needs of her family. However, the risk that she faces is the possibility of rotting if her fruits and vegetables are not sold on time. Amelita has learned the trade tips from her nine years of experience in fruit vending. Now she desires to buy more products to display in her stall in order to attract more buyers. Aside from this, she plans to renovate the space for her food house to adopt to the rainy season. She implores your kind support to make these things possible. A loan worth PHP 40,000 will surely go a long way. May you be God’s blessing to her as she aspires to improve her business. 

Amelita is married to Zaldy and they have children, one of whom cannot talk or walk until now due to congenital disease. It’s a huge challenge for the family but it keeps them united towards the goal to uplift their lives, finish their schooling, improve their business, and acquire their own house and lot.

Amelita is a devoted member of CCT Credit Cooperative and she regularly meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. *All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to display in her stall.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela, de 39 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, su pareja emigró hace unos años a los Estados Unidos, en su casa solo viven dos de sus tres hijos, porque hija también vive en Estados Unidos.

Desde que su esposo viajó al extranjero en busca de una mejor vida, Adela quedó en busca de algún trabajo y fue su hijo quien la motivó a que aprendiera acerca de la agricultura; ahora tiene tres años cultivando pipianes y se levanta desde muy temprano para ir a trabajar al campo.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, insecticidas, fungicidas y herbicidas para el buen manejo del cultivo de pipían, pues ya se avecina la época lluviosa y tiene que estar preparado.

Adela, sueña con que sus hijos se superen y lleguen a ser personas de bien y formen sus propios hogares.
texts.en:
Adela is 39 years old and studied until 3rd grade.  She is in a domestic partnership, and her partner immigrated to the United States a few years ago.  Only two of her 3 children live in her home, because her daughter also lives in the United States.   

Since her husband left looking for a better life, Adela has searched for a work.  Her daughter motivated her to learn more about agriculture, and now she has cultivated squash for 3 years.  She gets up very early to go work in the field.  

She needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, insecticides, fungicides, and herbicides to manage her cultivation, as the rainy season is approaching and she needs to be prepared.  

Adela dreams that her children will overcome and become good people and have their own households.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides, fungicide, and herbicides to manage her squash plants.
